trans-unit.source: The column widths are adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the columns later change, the columns will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: 每個方法呼叫; 會一次調整資料行寬度如果更新版本的資料行的內容變更，資料行就不會自動調整。

trans-unit.source: To resize a specific column, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要調整大小的特定資料行，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To set the columns to automatically resize whenever their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A> property or the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定的內容變更時自動調整大小的資料行，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode%2A>屬性或資料行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new widths based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載可讓您指定計算中一組有限的資料格，例如顯示資料列的值為基礎的新寬度調整大小模式。

trans-unit.source: This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: 當控制項包含大量的資料列時，這可改善效能。

trans-unit.source: This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> class.
trans-unit.target: 受到這個多載，並且為了讓您達到理想的儲存格的高度與寬度比例中衍生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>類別。

trans-unit.source: If `fixedHeight` is `false`, the column widths will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A> method next.
trans-unit.target: 如果`fixedHeight`是`false`，將計算資料行寬度，但卻將會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A>方法下一步。

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="autoSizeColumnsMode" /> has the value <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode.ColumnHeader" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersVisible" /> is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="autoSizeColumnsMode" /> 具有值 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode.ColumnHeader" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersVisible" /> 為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="autoSizeColumnsMode" /> has the value <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode.None" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode.Fill" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="autoSizeColumnsMode" /> 具有值 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode.None" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode.Fill" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="autoSizeColumnsMode" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="autoSizeColumnsMode" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the height of the specified row to fit the contents of its cells.
trans-unit.target: 調整指定資料列的高度，以適合其儲存格的內容。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row to resize.
trans-unit.target: 要調整大小之資料列的索引。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the height of the specified row to fit the contents of all its cells including the header cell.
trans-unit.target: 調整指定資料列的高度，以適合其所有儲存格的內容 (包括標題儲存格)。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when a row resizes.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制資料列重新調整大小時。

trans-unit.source: The row height is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the row later change, the row will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: 每個方法呼叫; 一次調整資料列高度如果更新版本的資料列的內容變更，則資料列將不會自動調整。

trans-unit.source: To resize all rows, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要調整大小的所有資料列，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To set the row to automatically resize whenever its contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定其內容變更時自動調整大小的資料列，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.True>.
trans-unit.target: 對於儲存格的內容分成多行換行，資料列重新調整大小時，作用中的資料格的儲存格樣式必須<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>屬性值為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.True>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

trans-unit.target: 若要調整大小的所有資料列，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To set the row to automatically resize whenever its contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定其內容變更時自動調整大小的資料列，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.True>.
trans-unit.target: 對於儲存格的內容分成多行換行，資料列重新調整大小時，作用中的資料格的儲存格樣式必須<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>屬性值為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.True>。

trans-unit.source: This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new height based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載可讓您指定計算中一組有限的資料格，例如顯示資料列的值為基礎的新高度調整大小模式。

trans-unit.source: This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: 當控制項包含大量的資料列時，這可改善效能。

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example resizes the third row in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> to fit the column contents.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會調整大小中的第三個資料列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>以符合資料行內容。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Programmatically Resize Cells to Fit Content in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 以程式設計方式調整儲存格為 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的內容納入](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="autoSizeRowMode" /> has the value <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode.RowHeader" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible" /> is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="autoSizeRowMode" /> 具有值 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode.RowHeader" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible" /> 為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="autoSizeRowMode" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="autoSizeRowMode" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of rows minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> 不在 0 到資料列數目減 1 的有效範圍內。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row to resize.
trans-unit.target: 要調整大小之資料列的索引。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to calculate the new height based on the current width of the columns; <see langword="false" /> to calculate the height with the expectation that the column widths will also be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示根據資料行的目前寬度來計算新的高度；<see langword="false" /> 則表示在預期資料行寬度也將會調整的情況下計算高度。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the height of the specified row using the specified size mode, optionally calculating the height with the expectation that column widths will subsequently be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的調整大小模式調整指定資料列的高度，並在預期接下來將調整資料行寬度的情況下，選擇性地計算高度。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when a row resizes.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制資料列重新調整大小時。

trans-unit.source: The row height is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the row later change, the row will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: 每個方法呼叫; 一次調整資料列高度如果更新版本的資料列的內容變更，則資料列將不會自動調整。

trans-unit.source: To resize all rows, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要調整大小的所有資料列，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To set the row to automatically resize whenever its contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定其內容變更時自動調整大小的資料列，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.True>.
trans-unit.target: 對於儲存格的內容分成多行換行，資料列重新調整大小時，作用中的資料格的儲存格樣式必須<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>屬性值為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.True>。

trans-unit.source: This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new height based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載可讓您指定計算中一組有限的資料格，例如顯示資料列的值為基礎的新高度調整大小模式。

trans-unit.source: This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: 當控制項包含大量的資料列時，這可改善效能。

trans-unit.source: This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> class.
trans-unit.target: 受到這個多載，並且為了讓您達到理想的儲存格的高度與寬度比例中衍生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>類別。

trans-unit.source: If `fixedWidth` is `false`, the row height will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> method next.
trans-unit.target: 如果`fixedWidth`是`false`，將計算資料列高度，但卻將會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>方法下一步。

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="autoSizeRowMode" /> has the value <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode.RowHeader" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible" /> is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="autoSizeRowMode" /> 具有值 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode.RowHeader" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible" /> 為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="autoSizeRowMode" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="autoSizeRowMode" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of rows minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> 不在 0 到資料列數目減 1 的有效範圍內。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the width of the row headers to fit the header contents.
trans-unit.target: 調整資料列行首的寬度，以適合行首的內容。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the width of the row headers using the specified size mode.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的調整大小模式調整資料列行首的寬度。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when the row headers resize.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制何時要調整大小資料列標頭。

trans-unit.source: The width of the row headers is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the row headers later change, the row headers will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: 每個方法呼叫; 一次調整資料列行首的寬度如果資料列內容標頭之後變更，將資料列的標頭會自動調整。

trans-unit.source: To set the row headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定資料列標頭時會變更其內容自動調整，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This method lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of headers, such as those in displayed rows only.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可讓您指定計算中一組有限的標頭，例如顯示資料列的值為基礎的新寬度調整大小模式。

trans-unit.source: This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: 當控制項包含大量的資料列時，這可改善效能。

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> has the value <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.EnableResizing" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.DisableResizing" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> 具有值 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.EnableResizing" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.DisableResizing" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row header with the changed content.
trans-unit.target: 包含已變更內容的資料列行首的索引。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the width of the row headers based on changes to the contents of the header in the specified row and using the specified size mode.
trans-unit.target: 根據指定資料列中的行首內容之變更，以及使用指定的調整大小模式來調整資料列行首的寬度。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when the row headers resize if only the contents of the header in the specified row have changed as a result of user edits or changes to a bound data source.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是如果您想要控制調整資料列標頭的大小，只變更的內容中指定的資料列的標頭有使用者編輯或變更的結果繫結的資料來源時很有用。

trans-unit.source: The width of the row headers is adjusted only once per method call if the content change requires it; if the contents of the row headers later change, the row headers will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: 資料列標頭的寬度調整一次每個方法呼叫的內容變更需要它; 如果如果資料列內容標頭之後變更，將資料列的標頭會自動調整。

trans-unit.source: To set the row headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定資料列標頭時會變更其內容自動調整，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This method lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of headers, such as those in displayed rows only.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可讓您指定計算中一組有限的標頭，例如顯示資料列的值為基礎的新寬度調整大小模式。

trans-unit.source: This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: 當控制項包含大量的資料列時，這可改善效能。

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to resize the row header widths based on changes to the contents of the first row header.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何根據第一個資料列行首的內容變更的標頭資料列寬度，調整大小。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Programmatically Resize Cells to Fit Content in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of rows minus 1.

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> 具有 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.EnableResizing" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.DisableResizing" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to calculate the new width based on the current height of the column headers; <see langword="false" /> to calculate the width with the expectation that the height of the column headers will also be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示根據目前資料行標頭的高度計算新的寬度；<see langword="false" /> 則表示在預期資料行標頭的高度也將會調整的情況下計算寬度。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to calculate the new width based on the current row heights; <see langword="false" /> to calculate the width with the expectation that the row heights will also be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示根據目前的資料列高度來計算新的寬度；<see langword="false" /> 則表示在預期資料列高度也將會調整的情況下計算寬度。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the width of the row headers using the specified size mode, optionally calculating the width with the expectation that the row and/or column header widths will subsequently be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的調整大小模式調整資料列行首的寬度，並在預期接下來將調整資料列和/或資料行行首寬度的情況下，選擇性地計算寬度。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when the row headers resize.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制何時要調整大小資料列標頭。

trans-unit.source: The width of the row headers is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the row headers later change, the row headers will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: 每個方法呼叫; 一次調整資料列行首的寬度如果資料列內容標頭之後變更，將資料列的標頭會自動調整。

trans-unit.source: To set the row headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定資料列標頭時會變更其內容自動調整，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This method lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of headers, such as those in displayed rows only.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可讓您指定計算中一組有限的標頭，例如顯示資料列的值為基礎的新寬度調整大小模式。

trans-unit.source: This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: 當控制項包含大量的資料列時，這可改善效能。

trans-unit.source: This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> class.
trans-unit.target: 受到這個多載，並且為了讓您達到理想的儲存格的高度與寬度比例中衍生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>類別。

trans-unit.source: If the `fixedColumnHeadersHeight` or `fixedRowsHeight` parameters are `false`, the width of the row headers will be calculated with the expectation that you will call methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight%2A> next.

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the width of the row headers based on changes to the contents of the header in the specified row and using the specified size mode, optionally calculating the width with the expectation that the row and/or column header widths will subsequently be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 根據指定資料列中行首內容的變更，以及使用指定的調整大小模式來調整資料列行首的寬度，並在預期接下來將調整資料列和/或資料行行首寬度的情況下，選擇性地計算寬度。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when the row headers resize if only the contents of the header in the specified row have changed as a result of user edits or changes to a bound data source.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是如果您想要控制調整資料列標頭的大小，只變更的內容中指定的資料列的標頭有使用者編輯或變更的結果繫結的資料來源時很有用。

trans-unit.source: The width of the row headers is adjusted only once per method call if the content change requires it; if the contents of the row headers later change, the row headers will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: 資料列標頭的寬度調整一次每個方法呼叫的內容變更需要它; 如果如果資料列內容標頭之後變更，將資料列的標頭會自動調整。

trans-unit.source: To set the row headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定資料列標頭時會變更其內容自動調整，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This method lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of headers, such as those in displayed rows only.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可讓您指定計算中一組有限的標頭，例如顯示資料列的值為基礎的新寬度調整大小模式。

trans-unit.source: This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: 當控制項包含大量的資料列時，這可改善效能。

trans-unit.source: This overload is protected, and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載已受到保護，而且是可讓您達到理想的儲存格的高度與寬度比例中衍生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>類別。

trans-unit.source: If the `fixedColumnHeadersHeight` or `fixedRowHeight` parameters are `false`, the width of the row headers will be calculated with the expectation that you will call methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight%2A> next.
trans-unit.target: 如果`fixedColumnHeadersHeight`或`fixedRowHeight`參數`false`，將計算資料列標頭的寬度，但卻會這類呼叫方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight%2A>下一步。

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of rows minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> 不在 0 到資料列數目減 1 的有效範圍內。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> has the value <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.EnableResizing" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.DisableResizing" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> 具有值 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.EnableResizing" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.DisableResizing" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the heights of some or all rows to fit their contents.
trans-unit.target: 調整某些或所有資料列的高度，以適合其內容。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the heights of all rows to fit the contents of all their cells, including the header cells.
trans-unit.target: 調整所有資料列的高度，以適合其所有儲存格的內容 (包括標題儲存格)。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when rows resize.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制當資料列的大小。

trans-unit.source: The row heights are adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the rows later change, the rows will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: 每個方法呼叫; 一次調整資料列高度如果內容的更新版本的資料列變更時，資料列將不會自動調整。

trans-unit.source: To resize a specific row, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要調整大小的特定資料列，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To resize a subset of rows, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode%2CSystem.Boolean%29> overload.
trans-unit.target: 若要調整大小的資料列子集，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode%2CSystem.Boolean%29>多載。

trans-unit.source: To set the rows to automatically resize whenever their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定的內容變更時自動調整大小的資料列，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.True>.
trans-unit.target: 對於儲存格的內容分成多行換行，資料列重新調整大小時，作用中的資料格的儲存格樣式必須<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>屬性值為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.True>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to resize all rows based on non-header cell content.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何調整非標頭資料格內容為基礎的所有資料列的大小。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Programmatically Resize Cells to Fit Content in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md).

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the heights of the rows using the specified size mode value.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的調整大小模式值來調整資料列的高度。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when rows resize.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制當資料列的大小。

trans-unit.source: The row heights are adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the rows later change, the rows will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: 每個方法呼叫; 一次調整資料列高度如果內容的更新版本的資料列變更時，資料列將不會自動調整。

trans-unit.source: To resize a specific row, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要調整大小的特定資料列，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To resize a subset of rows, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode%2CSystem.Boolean%29> overload.
trans-unit.target: 若要調整大小的資料列子集，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode%2CSystem.Boolean%29>多載。

trans-unit.source: To set the rows to automatically resize whenever their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定的內容變更時自動調整大小的資料列，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.True>.
trans-unit.target: 對於儲存格的內容分成多行換行，資料列重新調整大小時，作用中的資料格的儲存格樣式必須<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>屬性值為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.True>。

trans-unit.source: This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new heights based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載可讓您指定計算新的高度根據一組有限的資料格，例如顯示資料列中值的調整大小模式。

trans-unit.source: This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: 當控制項包含大量的資料列時，這可改善效能。

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to resize all rows based on non-header cell content.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何調整非標頭資料格內容為基礎的所有資料列的大小。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Programmatically Resize Cells to Fit Content in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 以程式設計方式調整儲存格為 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的內容納入](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="autoSizeRowsMode" /> has the value <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.AllHeaders" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.DisplayedHeaders" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible" /> is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="autoSizeRowsMode" /> 具有值 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.AllHeaders" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.DisplayedHeaders" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible" /> 是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="autoSizeRowsMode" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="autoSizeRowsMode" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="autoSizeRowsMode" /> has the value <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.None" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="autoSizeRowsMode" /> 具有值 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.None" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to calculate the new heights based on the current column widths; <see langword="false" /> to calculate the heights with the expectation that the column widths will also be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示根據目前的資料行寬度計算新的高度；<see langword="false" /> 則表示在預期資料行寬度也將會調整的情況下計算高度。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the heights of all rows using the specified size mode, optionally calculating the heights with the expectation that column widths will subsequently be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的調整大小模式調整所有資料列的高度，並在預期接下來將調整資料行寬度的情況下，選擇性地計算高度。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when rows resize.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制當資料列的大小。

trans-unit.source: The row heights are adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the rows later change, the rows will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: 每個方法呼叫; 一次調整資料列高度如果內容的更新版本的資料列變更時，資料列將不會自動調整。

trans-unit.source: To resize a specific row, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要調整大小的特定資料列，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To resize a subset of rows, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode%2CSystem.Boolean%29> overload.
trans-unit.target: 若要調整大小的資料列子集，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode%2CSystem.Boolean%29>多載。

trans-unit.source: To set the rows to automatically resize whenever their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定的內容變更時自動調整大小的資料列，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.True>.
trans-unit.target: 對於儲存格的內容分成多行換行，資料列重新調整大小時，作用中的資料格的儲存格樣式必須<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>屬性值為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.True>。

trans-unit.source: This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new heights based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載可讓您指定計算新的高度根據一組有限的資料格，例如顯示資料列中值的調整大小模式。

trans-unit.source: This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: 當控制項包含大量的資料列時，這可改善效能。

trans-unit.source: This overload is protected, and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載已受到保護，而且是可讓您達到理想的儲存格的高度與寬度比例中衍生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>類別。

trans-unit.source: If the `fixedWidth` parameter is `false`, the row heights will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> method next.
trans-unit.target: 如果`fixedWidth`參數是`false`，將計算資料列高度，但卻將會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>方法下一步。

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="autoSizeRowsMode" /> has the value <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.AllHeaders" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.DisplayedHeaders" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible" /> is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="autoSizeRowsMode" /> 具有值 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.AllHeaders" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.DisplayedHeaders" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible" /> 是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="autoSizeRowsMode" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="autoSizeRowsMode" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="autoSizeRowsMode" /> has the value <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.None" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="autoSizeRowsMode" /> 具有值 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.None" />。

trans-unit.source: The index of the first row to resize.
trans-unit.target: 要調整大小之第一個資料列的索引。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows to resize.
trans-unit.target: 要調整大小的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to calculate the new heights based on the current column widths; <see langword="false" /> to calculate the heights with the expectation that the column widths will also be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示根據目前的資料行寬度計算新的高度；<see langword="false" /> 則表示在預期資料行寬度也將會調整的情況下計算高度。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the heights of the specified rows using the specified size mode, optionally calculating the heights with the expectation that column widths will subsequently be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的調整大小模式調整指定資料列的高度，並在預期接下來將調整資料行寬度的情況下，選擇性地計算高度。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you want to control when rows resize, but you want to resize only a specific subset of rows, such as those within a range of bound records that have been updated.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是如果您想要控制資料列的大小，但您想要調整大小只有特定資料列的子集，例如已更新的繫結記錄的範圍內時很有用。

trans-unit.source: The row heights for the specified rows are adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the rows later change, the rows will not automatically adjust.
trans-unit.target: 資料列高度，以指定的資料列會一次調整每個方法呼叫。如果內容的更新版本的資料列變更時，資料列將不會自動調整。

trans-unit.source: To resize a specific row, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要調整大小的特定資料列，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To resize all rows, use a different overload of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要調整大小的所有資料列，請使用不同的多載的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To set the rows to automatically resize whenever their contents change, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定的內容變更時自動調整大小的資料列，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.True>.
trans-unit.target: 對於儲存格的內容分成多行換行，資料列重新調整大小時，作用中的資料格的儲存格樣式必須<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>屬性值為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.True>。

trans-unit.source: This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new heights based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載可讓您指定計算新的高度根據一組有限的資料格，例如顯示資料列中值的調整大小模式。

trans-unit.source: This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: 當控制項包含大量的資料列時，這可改善效能。

trans-unit.source: This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> class.
trans-unit.target: 受到這個多載，並且為了讓您達到理想的儲存格的高度與寬度比例中衍生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>類別。

trans-unit.source: If the `fixedWidth` parameter is `false`, the row heights will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> method next.
trans-unit.target: 如果`fixedWidth`參數是`false`，將計算資料列高度，但卻將會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>方法下一步。

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="autoSizeRowsMode" /> has the value <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.AllHeaders" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.DisplayedHeaders" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible" /> is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="autoSizeRowsMode" /> 具有值 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.AllHeaders" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.DisplayedHeaders" />，且 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible" /> 是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="autoSizeRowsMode" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="autoSizeRowsMode" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="autoSizeRowsMode" /> has the value <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.None" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="autoSizeRowsMode" /> 具有值 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.None" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rowIndexStart" /> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowIndexStart" /> 小於 0。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="rowsCount" /> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowsCount" /> 小於 0。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟用，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode" /> property of a column changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於資料行的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode" /> 屬性值變更時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用此事件。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Manipulate Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[如何： 處理 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料行](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating how column widths are determined.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示要如何判斷資料行的寬度。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode.None" />。

trans-unit.source: This property lets you configure the control so that column widths are automatically adjusted either to fill the control or to fit cell contents.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可讓您設定控制項，以便填滿控制項，或調整儲存格的內容，自動調整資料行寬度。

trans-unit.source: Size adjustments occur in fill mode whenever the width of the control changes.
trans-unit.target: 每當變更控制項的寬度調整大小就會發生在填滿模式。

trans-unit.source: In content-based sizing modes, size adjustments occur whenever cell contents change or, if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> is enabled, whenever row heights change.
trans-unit.target: 在以內容為基礎的調整大小模式調整大小發生或儲存格內容變更時，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>啟用時，每當資料列高度變更時。

trans-unit.source: Some content-based sizing modes let you limit the size adjustment to the currently displayed rows in order to increase performance.
trans-unit.target: 某些以內容為基礎的調整大小模式可讓您限制目前所顯示的資料列的大小調整，以提升效能。

trans-unit.source: To change the sizing mode for an individual column, set its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更個別資料行的調整模式，將其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The default value of this property is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode.NotSet>, indicating that the column inherits its behavior and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode%2A> property value from the control.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的預設值是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode.NotSet>，指出資料行繼承它的行為及其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode%2A>從控制項的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Columns in fill mode divide the available control width in proportions indicated by their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.FillWeight%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: 中的填滿模式資料行分割中所指定的比例的可用控制項寬度其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.FillWeight%2A>屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The width available for fill mode is determined by subtracting the widths of all other columns from the width of the client area of the control.
trans-unit.target: 適用於填滿模式寬度取決於減去從用戶端區域控制項的寬度的所有資料行的寬度。

trans-unit.source: If this width is smaller than the combined <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.MinimumWidth%2A> values of all fill-mode columns, the horizontal scroll bar is displayed, all fill-mode columns are shown with their minimum widths, and user column-resizing is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果此寬度小於結合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.MinimumWidth%2A>所有填滿模式資料行的值，會顯示水平捲軸、 最小寬度，以顯示所有填滿模式資料行和使用者資料行調整已停用。

trans-unit.source: For more information about column fill mode, see [Column Fill Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/column-fill-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關資料行填入模式的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料行填入模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/column-fill-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Only columns with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property value of `true` are resized automatically, and changing the visibility of a column does not cause resizing to occur.
trans-unit.target: 只有包含資料行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A>屬性值為`true`會自動調整其大小，而且變更的資料行可見性不會進行調整大小。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, when columns are set to automatically resize, the user cannot adjust the column widths with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 此外，當資料行自動調整設定，使用者將無法調整資料行寬度，使用滑鼠。

trans-unit.source: To adjust column widths programmatically, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> methods or set the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Width%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要以程式設計方式調整資料行寬度，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumn%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>方法或一組資料行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Width%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about content-based automatic sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需以內容為基礎的自動調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to use this property in a master/detail scenario where two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controls display data from two tables in a parent/child relationship.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個屬性主要/詳細資料案例中，兩個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項會顯示兩個資料表中的父子式關聯性。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the column sizing mode for the master control is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode.None>, and the column widths are programmatically initialized to fit the loaded values.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，主控制項的資料行調整大小模式是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode.None>，而資料行寬度會以程式設計的方式初始化成載入的值。

trans-unit.source: The details control is set to an automatic column sizing mode so that columns will adjust automatically whenever the values change (for example, when the user changes the current row in the parent table).
trans-unit.target: 詳細資料控制項是設定為自動的資料行的調整大小模式，使資料行就會自動調整時的值變更 （例如，當使用者變更父資料表中的目前資料列）。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Create a Master/Detail Form Using Two Windows Forms DataGridView Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/create-a-master-detail-form-using-two-datagridviews.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 建立主從式表單使用兩個 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/create-a-master-detail-form-using-two-datagridviews.md)。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時所指定的值不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode.ColumnHeader" />, column headers are hidden, and at least one visible column has an <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode" /> property value of <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode.NotSet" />.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時所指定的值是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode.ColumnHeader" />，則資料行標頭會隱藏，而且至少有一個可見資料行具有 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode.NotSet" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode" /> 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: -or-

The specified value when setting this property is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode.Fill" /> and at least one visible column with an <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode" /> property value of <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode.NotSet" /> is frozen.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時所指定的值是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode.Fill" /> 且至少有一個具有 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode.NotSet" /> 之 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode" /> 屬性值的可見資料行已凍結。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsMode" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsModeChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnsModeChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating how row heights are determined.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出要如何判斷資料列的高度。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode" /> value indicating the sizing mode.
trans-unit.target: 指出調整大小模式的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.None" />。

trans-unit.source: This property lets you configure the control so that row heights are automatically adjusted to fit their contents whenever the contents change.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可讓您設定控制項，以適合其內容，每當內容變更時，會自動調整資料列的高度。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> is enabled, row heights are also adjusted whenever column widths change.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>已啟用，資料列高度也將進行調整資料行寬度變更時。

trans-unit.source: Some sizing modes let you limit the size adjustment to the currently displayed rows in order to increase performance.
trans-unit.target: 某些調整大小模式可讓您限制目前所顯示的資料列的大小調整，以提升效能。

trans-unit.source: Only rows with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible%2A> property value of `true` are resized automatically, and changing the visibility of a row does not cause resizing to occur.
trans-unit.target: 只有當資料列與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible%2A>屬性值為`true`會自動調整其大小，而且變更資料列的可見性不會進行調整大小。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, when rows are set to automatically resize, the user cannot adjust the row heights with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 此外，當自動調整設定的資料列時，使用者將無法調整資料列高度，以滑鼠。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height%2A> value of an automatically sized row is recalculated during layout to account for the size of the font that is used.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height%2A>自動調整大小的資料列的值會重新計算期間配置來說明所用的字型的大小。

trans-unit.source: To get the correct <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height%2A>, you should retrieve the value in the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event instead of in the form's constructor.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得正確<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height%2A>，您應該擷取表單中的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>而不是表單的建構函式中的事件。

trans-unit.source: To adjust row heights programmatically, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A> methods, or set the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要以程式設計方式調整資料列高度，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRow%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A>方法或一組資料列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.True>.
trans-unit.target: 對於儲存格的內容分成多行換行，資料列重新調整大小時，作用中的資料格的儲存格樣式必須<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>屬性值為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.True>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about content-based automatic sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需以內容為基礎的自動調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the row to automatically resize based on the contents of the row headers and all of the columns.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定為自動調整大小資料列標頭和所有資料行的內容為基礎的資料列。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Automatically Resize Cells When Content Changes in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/automatically-resize-cells-when-content-changes-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[如何： 自動調整儲存格時的內容變更 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/automatically-resize-cells-when-content-changes-in-the-datagrid.md)。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時所指定的值不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.AllHeaders" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.DisplayedHeaders" /> and row headers are hidden.
trans-unit.target: 在設定這個屬性時的指定值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.AllHeaders" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.DisplayedHeaders" />，而且會隱藏資料列行首。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用此事件。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Automatically Resize Cells When Content Changes in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/automatically-resize-cells-when-content-changes-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[如何： 自動調整儲存格時的內容變更 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/automatically-resize-cells-when-content-changes-in-the-datagrid.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color for the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the background color of the control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，代表控制項的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor" /> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this control.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個控制項無關。

trans-unit.source: To set the background color of the portion of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control not occupied by cells, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定的部分的背景色彩<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項不會佔用儲存格，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundColor%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackColor" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackColor" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackColorChanged> event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackColor%2A> property is changed programmatically or by user interaction.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackColorChanged>就會引發事件，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackColor%2A>屬性變更時以程式設計方式或使用者互動。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the background color of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="P:System.Drawing.SystemColors.AppWorkspace" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.SystemColors.AppWorkspace" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundColor%2A> property determines the color of the area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> that is not filled with cells.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundColor%2A>屬性決定的區域的色彩<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>，將不會填滿資料格。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundColor%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties.
trans-unit.target: 此外，程式碼範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `dataGridView1`, and then call the `SetUpDataGridView` method from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`dataGridView1`，然後呼叫`SetUpDataGridView`從表單的建構函式的方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Ensure all events are associated with their event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 請確定所有事件都都具有其事件處理常式相關聯。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時所指定的值是 <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The specified value when setting this property has a <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Color.A" /> property value that is less that 255.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時所指定之值的 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Color.A" /> 屬性值小於 255。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundColorChanged> event.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在控制項中顯示的背景影像。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> that represents the image to display in the background of the control.
trans-unit.target: 表示要在控制項背景中顯示之影像的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this control.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個控制項無關。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundImage" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundImage" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image layout as defined in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" /> 列舉類型中所定義的背景影像配置。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" /> value indicating the background image layout.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" /> 值，表示背景影像配置。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout.Tile" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout.Tile" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this control.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個控制項無關。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundImageLayout" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundImageLayout" /> 屬性變更時。

trans-unit.source: Although this event occurs as described, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundImageLayout%2A> property is not relevant for this control.
trans-unit.target: 雖然如所述，就會發生此事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundImageLayout%2A>屬性對這個控制項無關。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to select all the cell's contents; <see langword="false" /> to not select any contents.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示選取所有儲存格的內容，<see langword="false" /> 則表示不選取任何內容。

trans-unit.source: Puts the current cell in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 將目前儲存格置於編輯模式下。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current cell is already in edit mode or successfully enters edit mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前儲存格已經處於編輯模式下，或成功進入編輯模式，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method returns `false` if the cell fails to enter edit mode, which can happen for a number of reasons.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回`false`儲存格無法進入編輯模式，這可能會針對多種原因所造成。

trans-unit.source: This method returns `false` if the current cell is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回`false`如果目前儲存格為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: It also returns `false` if the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType%2A> property is `null` (meaning the cell cannot host an editing control) and the cell type does not implement the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingCell> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它也會傳回`false`如果儲存格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType%2A>屬性是`null`（這表示儲存格無法裝載編輯控制項），但資料格類型未實作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingCell>介面。

trans-unit.source: If the cell supports editing, this method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBeginEdit> event, which can be canceled, and returns `false` if an event handler cancels the edit.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料格支援編輯，此方法就會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBeginEdit>事件，可以取消，並傳回`false`如果事件處理常式取消編輯。

trans-unit.source: If the edit is not canceled and the cell can host an editing control, this method initializes the control and displays it.
trans-unit.target: 如果未取消編輯，而且資料格可以裝載編輯控制項，這個方法會初始化的控制項，並顯示。

trans-unit.source: If the initialization fails, this method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果初始化失敗，則這個方法會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: If the cell successfully enters edit mode, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellInEditMode%2A> property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料格成功進入編輯模式，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellInEditMode%2A>屬性會傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell" /> is not set to a valid cell.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell" /> 未設為有效的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: -or-
This method was called in a handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBeginEdit" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 已在 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBeginEdit" /> 事件的處理常式中呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The type indicated by the cell's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType" /> property does not derive from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> type.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType" /> 屬性所指示的型別並非衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> 型別。

trans-unit.source: -or-

The type indicated by the cell's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType" /> property does not implement the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType" /> 屬性所指示的型別並不實作 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl" /> 介面。

trans-unit.source: Initialization of the editing cell value failed and either there is no handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> event or the handler has set the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> property to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 編輯儲存格值初始化失敗，而且不是沒有 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> 事件的處理常式，就是處理常式已將 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> 屬性設為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <see cref="T:System.FormatException" />.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況物件通常可轉換成 <see cref="T:System.FormatException" /> 類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 的框線樣式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle.FixedSingle" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle.FixedSingle" />。

trans-unit.source: This property affects the outer border of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會影響外的框<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。

trans-unit.source: To set the style of the cell borders, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定的儲存格框線樣式，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a simple data-bound <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何初始化簡單資料繫結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 它也會示範如何設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BorderStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時所指定的值不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BorderStyle" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BorderStyle" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BorderStyleChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
