trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BorderStyleChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BorderStyleChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Cancels edit mode for the currently selected cell and discards any changes.
trans-unit.target: 針對目前所選的儲存格取消編輯模式，並捨棄所有變更。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the cancel was successful; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果取消成功，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [Column Fill Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/column-fill-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料行填滿模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/column-fill-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control is <see langword="true" /> and the cancels edits in a row.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true" />，且取消資料列中的編輯時。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is in virtual mode, changes are committed to the data cache at the cell level by default.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>是在虛擬模式中，會認可變更，讓資料快取資料格層級預設。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CancelRowEdit> event can be used when implementing row-level transactions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CancelRowEdit>實作資料列層級的交易時，就可以使用事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to handle this event for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control in virtual mode.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何處理此事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>虛擬模式中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: When the control is in edit mode, the `rowInEdit` variable holds the index of the row being edited, and the `customerInEdit` variable holds a reference to a Customer object corresponding to that row.
trans-unit.target: 當控制項處於編輯模式，`rowInEdit`變數會保留正在編輯的資料列的索引和`customerInEdit`變數會保存到該資料列對應的客戶物件的參考。

trans-unit.source: When the user cancels out of edit mode, this object can be discarded.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者取消離開編輯模式時，這個物件可以捨棄。

trans-unit.source: If the row the user was editing is the row for new records, however, the old Customer object is discarded and replaced with a new one so that the user can begin making edits again.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者已編輯的資料列是新的記錄的資料列，不過，舊客戶的物件會捨棄而取代新，讓使用者可以重新開始進行編輯。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [Walkthrough: Implementing Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/implementing-virtual-mode-wf-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[逐步解說： 在 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中實作虛擬模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/implementing-virtual-mode-wf-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode" /> property can be set to an active value, to enable IME support.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode" /> 屬性是否可以設定為使用中的值，以啟用 IME 支援。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if there is an editable cell selected; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果有已選取的可編輯儲存格，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when edit mode starts for the selected cell.
trans-unit.target: 啟動所選取儲存格的編輯模式時發生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to handle this event to reflect that the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> is being edited.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何處理這個事件，以反映目前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>正在進行編輯。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> property of the containing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> is set to reflect which cell is being edited.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A>屬性包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>設定以反映正在編輯的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `dataGridView1`, and ensure all events are associated with their event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`dataGridView1`，並確定其事件處理常式相關聯的所有事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the cell border style for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 的儲存格框線樣式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle" /> that represents the border style of the cells contained in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle" />，表示包含在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 中之儲存格的框線樣式。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A> property is set to anything other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle.Single>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle.SingleHorizontal>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle.SingleVertical>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A> property must be a system color.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>以外屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle.Single>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle.SingleHorizontal>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle.SingleVertical>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A>屬性必須是系統色彩。

trans-unit.source: You cannot set this property to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle.Custom> value, which is a read-only value indicating that the cell border style has been customized through the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您無法將此屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle.Custom>值，這是唯讀，這個值表示，已透過使用的自訂儲存格框線樣式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `dataGridView1`, and then call the `SetUpDataGridView` method from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`dataGridView1`，然後呼叫`SetUpDataGridView`從表單的建構函式的方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Ensure all events are associated with their event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 請確定所有事件都都具有其事件處理常式相關聯。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時所指定的值不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle.Custom" />.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時所指定的值是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellBorderStyle.Custom" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the border style of a cell changes.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格的框線樣式變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyleChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyleChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyleChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyleChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when any part of a cell is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 發生於按一下儲存格的任何部分時。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when any part of a cell is clicked, including borders and padding.
trans-unit.target: 此事件發生於按一下儲存格的任何部分時，包含框線和邊框間距。

trans-unit.source: It also occurs when the user presses and releases the SPACE key while a button cell or check box cell has focus, and will occur twice for these cell types if the cell is clicked while pressing the SPACE key.
trans-unit.target: 也會在使用者按下並釋放的空間索引鍵時按鈕儲存格或核取方塊儲存格焦點時，如果按下空格鍵，按一下資料格就會發生兩次的這些資料格類型。

trans-unit.source: To determine when the cell contents are clicked, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷按下儲存格內容時，處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: This event does not receive information about the mouse position.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件不會接收滑鼠位置的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: If the event handler needs information about the mouse position, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件處理常式需要的滑鼠位置的相關資訊，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: For clicks in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>, this event occurs before the check box changes value, so if you do not want to calculate the expected value based on the current value, you will typically handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event instead.
trans-unit.target: 在按一下<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>、 值的核取方塊變更，因此如果您不想計算預期的值根據目前的值之前，就會發生此事件，您通常會處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件改為。

trans-unit.source: Because that event occurs only when the user-specified value is committed, which typically occurs when focus leaves the cell, you must also handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 因為該事件發生時，只有使用者指定的值在認可時，這通常發生於焦點離開儲存格，您也必須處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: In that handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts.Commit> value.
trans-unit.target: 在該處理常式中，核取方塊儲存格的目前儲存格時，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法並傳入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts.Commit>值。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick> event handler in a Tic-Tac-Toe game implementation that uses image columns in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick>井字遊戲的遊戲實作使用映像中的資料行中的事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Unless the game is over or the cell has already been clicked, the event handler sets the cell value to one of two <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> objects represented by the variables `x` and `o`.
trans-unit.target: 除非遊戲便會結束或已按下儲存格，此事件處理常式會將儲存格的值設定為有兩個<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>變數所代表的物件`x`和`o`。

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger example shown in [How to: Work with Image Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 這段程式碼會顯示在較大範例的一部分[How to： 使用 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的影像資料行](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the content within a cell is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 按一下儲存格內的內容時發生。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when the cell content is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 在按下儲存格內容時，就會發生此事件。

trans-unit.source: It also occurs when the user presses and releases the SPACEBAR while a button cell or check box cell has focus, and will occur twice for these cell types if the cell content is clicked while pressing the SPACEBAR.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按下並放開按鈕儲存格時空格鍵，或核取方塊儲存格焦點時，以及如果按下空格鍵，按一下儲存格內容，就會發生兩次的這些資料格類型時，它也會發生。

trans-unit.source: Use this event to detect button clicks for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell> or link clicks for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell>.
trans-unit.target: 使用此事件可偵測的按鈕點選<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>或點選連結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell>。

trans-unit.source: For clicks in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>, this event occurs before the check box changes value, so if you do not want to calculate the expected value based on the current value, you will typically handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event instead.
trans-unit.target: 在按一下<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>、 值的核取方塊變更，因此如果您不想計算預期的值根據目前的值之前，就會發生此事件，您通常會處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件改為。

trans-unit.source: Because that event occurs only when the user-specified value is committed, which typically occurs when focus leaves the cell, you must also handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 因為該事件發生時，只有使用者指定的值在認可時，這通常發生於焦點離開儲存格，您也必須處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: In that handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts.Commit> value.
trans-unit.target: 在該處理常式中，核取方塊儲存格的目前儲存格時，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法並傳入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts.Commit>值。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example provides a handler for this event that determines whether the clicked cell is a link cell or a button cell and performs the corresponding action as a result.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例提供此決定是否按下儲存格的連結資料格或按鈕儲存格並執行對應的動作結果的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn> class overview topic.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn>類別概觀主題。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks a cell's contents.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者按兩下儲存格的內容時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip" /> 屬性變更時。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell's shortcut menu is needed.
trans-unit.target: 發生於需要儲存格的捷徑功能表時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>只發生事件時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>屬性設定或其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>屬性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event, the shortcut menu that you specify in the handler is shown whenever the user right-clicks a cell.
trans-unit.target: 當您處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>您指定的處理常式中的捷徑功能表會顯示事件，每當使用者按一下滑鼠右鍵在資料格。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want to display a shortcut menu determined by the current state or value of a cell.
trans-unit.target: 當您想要顯示的捷徑功能表，取決於目前的狀態或儲存格的值，這非常有用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the user right-clicks a cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>事件也會發生值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>擷取屬性，或是以程式設計的方式，或當使用者按一下滑鼠右鍵在資料格。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> properties to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>屬性來判斷狀態或儲存格值，並使用此資訊來變更或修改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會初始化儲存格的值與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>事件值會覆寫的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> value for multiple cells.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>事件時使用大量的資料，以避免效能的負面影響的設定儲存格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>多個資料格的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can also specify shortcut menus for individual rows rather than individual cells by setting the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property or handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以指定快顯功能表，針對個別資料列，而不是個別儲存格的資料列設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>屬性或處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>事件。

trans-unit.source: The cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting overrides the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event overrides both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event and the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting.
trans-unit.target: 資料格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>屬性設定會覆寫的資料列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>屬性設定值，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>事件覆寫兩者<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>事件和資料列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>屬性設定。

trans-unit.source: However, you can specify `null` for a cell shortcut menu to prevent a row shortcut menu from being overridden.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您可以指定`null`的儲存格的捷徑功能表，以防止遭到覆寫的資料列的捷徑功能表。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event handler to display a custom shortcut menu used when the user right-clicks a cell.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>事件處理常式，以顯示使用者以滑鼠右鍵按一下資料格時，使用自訂的捷徑功能表。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks anywhere in a cell.
trans-unit.target: 使用者按兩下儲存格中的任何位置時發生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellDoubleClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellDoubleClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellDoubleClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellDoubleClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when edit mode stops for the currently selected cell.
trans-unit.target: 目前所選取儲存格的編輯模式停止時發生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to handle this event to clear the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property in case it was previously set by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何處理這個事件來清除資料列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性在先前設定的情況下<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating> event handler can clear the error text when the new cell value meets the validation criteria, but when the user reverts to the old cell value by pressing ESC, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating> event does not occur.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating>新儲存格的值符合驗證準則，但按下 ESC，使用者會還原成舊資料格的值時，事件處理常式可以清除錯誤文字<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating>事件不會發生。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [Walkthrough: Validating Data in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/walkthrough-validating-data-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[逐步解說： 驗證 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/walkthrough-validating-data-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the current cell changes in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control or when the control receives input focus.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項中的目前儲存格變更時，或是當控制項收到輸入焦點時。

trans-unit.source: This event may occur twice for a single click if the control does not have input focus and the clicked cell was not previously the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項不具有輸入的焦點且按下儲存格之前不是目前儲存格，此事件可能會發生兩次的按一下。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to handle this event to change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor%2A> property of the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何處理這個事件來變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor%2A>屬性的目前儲存格。

trans-unit.source: In this example the selection background color is set in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellEnter> event, then reset to <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty> on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellLeave> event.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例設定的選取項目背景色彩<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellEnter>事件，然後重設為<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty>上<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellLeave>事件。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `dataGridView1` and ensure that all events are associated with their event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`dataGridView1`，並確定其事件處理常式相關聯的所有事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText" /> property of a cell changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於儲存格的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText" /> 屬性值變更時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell's error text is needed.
trans-unit.target: 需要儲存格的錯誤文字時發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>只發生事件時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>屬性設定或其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>屬性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> event is useful when you want to determine the error for a cell depending on its value or state.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>事件很實用，當您想要判斷其值或狀態資料格的錯誤。

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> event and specify error text in the handler, an error glyph appears in the cell unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellErrors%2A> property is set to `false` or the cell is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 當您處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>事件，並指定錯誤文字中處理常式中，錯誤圖像顯示在儲存格中除非<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellErrors%2A>屬性設定為`false`或儲存格處於編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: When the user moves the mouse pointer over the error glyph, the error text appears in a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者將滑鼠指標移錯誤圖像時，錯誤文字會出現在工具提示中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>事件也會發生值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>擷取屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> property to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>屬性來判斷狀態或儲存格值，並使用此資訊來變更或修改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會初始化儲存格的值與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A>事件值會覆寫的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A> value for multiple cells.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>事件時使用大量的資料，以避免效能的負面影響的設定儲存格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A>多個資料格的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create error messages for cells without unsharing rows or causing the cell error to be duplicated over all the shared cells.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立儲存格的錯誤訊息，而不需要取消共用資料列，或造成複製到共用的儲存格的儲存格錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the contents of a cell need to be formatted for display.
trans-unit.target: 需設定要顯示之儲存格內容的格式時發生。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control will attempt to convert a cell's value into a format suitable for display.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項將會嘗試將儲存格的值轉換成適合顯示的格式。

trans-unit.source: For example, it will convert a numerical value into a string for display in a text box cell.
trans-unit.target: 例如，它會將數值轉換成文字 方塊儲存格中顯示字串。

trans-unit.source: You can indicate the formatting convention to use by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by properties such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定要使用的設定的格式設定慣例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>這類屬性所傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the standard formatting is insufficient, you can customize the formatting by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果您沒有足夠的標準格式，您可以自訂格式設定，請處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>事件。

trans-unit.source: This event lets you indicate the exact display value as well as the cell styles, such as background and foreground color, to use for the cell display.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可讓您指出精確顯示值，以及儲存格樣式，例如背景和前景色彩，用於儲存格顯示。

trans-unit.source: This means you can handle this event for any kind of cell formatting, regardless of whether the cell value itself needs formatting.
trans-unit.target: 這表示您可以處理這個事件的任何一種格式，不管儲存格的值本身是否需要格式化的資料格。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event occurs every time each cell is painted, so you should avoid lengthy processing when handling this event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>每一次，每個儲存格繪製，因此您應該避免的漫長處理在處理此事件時，就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: This event also occurs when the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> is retrieved or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 也會發生此事件時的儲存格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A>擷取或其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is initialized with the cell value.
trans-unit.target: 當您處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>事件，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會初始化與儲存格的值。

trans-unit.source: If you provide custom conversion from the cell value to the display value, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to the converted value, ensuring that the new value is of the type specified by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您提供從儲存格的值來顯示值的自訂轉換，將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>要轉換的值，以確保新值的儲存格所指定型別的屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To indicate that no further value formatting is necessary, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要指出格式化任何其他值是必要，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: When the event handler completes, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is `null` or is not of the correct type, or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> is formatted using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> properties of the cell style returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, which is initialized using the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此事件處理常式完成時，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>是`null`或不正確的型別，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性是`false`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>使用格式化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>屬性所傳回的儲存格樣式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，使用儲存格初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, the display properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property are used to render the cell.
trans-unit.target: 值為何<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，所傳回的物件的顯示屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性用來呈現資料格。

trans-unit.source: For more information about custom formatting using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event, see [How to: Customize Data Formatting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-data-formatting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關自訂格式化使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>事件，請參閱[How to： 在 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中自訂格式化資料](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-data-formatting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: To avoid performance penalties when handling this event, access the cell through the parameters of the event handler rather than accessing the cell directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免效能的負面影響，在處理此事件時，存取參數傳遞的事件處理常式，而不是直接存取儲存格的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: To customize the conversion of a formatted, user-specified value into an actual cell value, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要自訂格式化的使用者指定的值轉換成實際的資料格的值，處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell loses input focus and is no longer the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格失去輸入焦點且不再是目前儲存格時發生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to handle this event to change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor%2A> property of the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何處理這個事件來變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor%2A>屬性的目前儲存格。

trans-unit.source: In this example the selection background color is set in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellEnter> event, then reset to <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty> on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellLeave> event.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例設定的選取項目背景色彩<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellEnter>事件，然後重設為<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty>上<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellLeave>事件。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `dataGridView1` and ensure that all events are associated with their event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`dataGridView1`，並確定其事件處理常式相關聯的所有事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs whenever the user clicks anywhere on a cell with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 每當使用者以滑鼠按一下儲存格上的任何地方時發生。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when the user clicks using any of the mouse buttons.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按一下 使用任何滑鼠按鈕，就會發生此事件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.Button%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to determine which button was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.Button%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性來判斷哪一個按鈕已按下。

trans-unit.source: To detect clicks on the contents of a cell, such as a button or link within a cell, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要偵測點選的資料格，例如按鈕或連結資料格中，內容使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: The handler for this event receives the column index and row index of the mouse pointer position.
trans-unit.target: 此事件處理常式會接收的資料行索引和資料列的滑鼠指標位置的索引。

trans-unit.source: For clicks in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>, this event occurs before the check box changes value, so if you do not want to calculate the expected value based on the current value, you will typically handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> event instead.
trans-unit.target: 在按一下<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>、 值的核取方塊變更，因此如果您不想計算預期的值根據目前的值之前，就會發生此事件，您通常會處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged>事件改為。

trans-unit.source: Because that event occurs only when the user-specified value is committed, which typically occurs when focus leaves the cell, you must also handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 因為該事件發生時，只有使用者指定的值在認可時，這通常發生於焦點離開儲存格，您也必須處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: In that handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A> method and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts.Commit> value.
trans-unit.target: 在該處理常式中，核取方塊儲存格的目前儲存格時，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A>方法並傳入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts.Commit>值。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseEnter> event handler in a Tic-Tac-Toe game implementation that uses image columns in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseEnter>井字遊戲的遊戲實作使用映像中的資料行中的事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The event handler uses the cell value to determine the cursor and ToolTip to display.
trans-unit.target: 此事件處理常式會使用儲存格的值來決定資料指標和顯示的工具提示。

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger example shown in [How to: Work with Image Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 這段程式碼會顯示在較大範例的一部分[How to： 使用 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的影像資料行](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.target: 滑鼠指標離開儲存格時發生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseLeave> event handler in a Tic-Tac-Toe game implementation that uses image columns in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseLeave>井字遊戲的遊戲實作使用映像中的資料行中的事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The event handler resets the cursor and ToolTip, which are set in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseEnter> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 資料指標和工具提示中所設定的事件處理常式會重設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseEnter>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger example shown in [How to: Work with Image Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseUp> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseUp>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseUp> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseUp>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell needs to be drawn.
trans-unit.target: 需要繪製儲存格時發生。

trans-unit.source: You can handle this event to customize the appearance of cells in the control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以處理此事件，以自訂控制項中的儲存格的外觀。

trans-unit.source: You can paint entire cells yourself, or paint specific parts of cells and use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.PaintBackground%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.PaintContent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> methods to paint other parts.
trans-unit.target: 您可以繪製整個儲存格，您自己，或 [小畫家] 的資料格的特定部分，並使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.PaintBackground%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.PaintContent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>來繪製其他部分的方法。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> class to paint standard controls using the current theme.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>類別來繪製標準控制項使用的目前佈景主題。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[視覺化樣式呈現控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。

trans-unit.source: If you are using [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], you also have access to a large library of standard images that you can use with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，您也可以存取的標準映像，您可以使用大型的程式庫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: When handling this event, you should access the cell through the parameters of the event handler, rather than access the cell directly.
trans-unit.target: 當處理此事件，您應該透過事件處理常式的參數，而不是直接存取儲存格。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to use this event to customize the appearance of all cells in a particular column.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用此事件可自訂的特定資料行中的所有資料格的外觀。

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger example available in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Cells in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-cells-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格外觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-cells-in-the-datagrid.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell leaves edit mode if the cell value has been modified.
trans-unit.target: 發生於已經修改儲存格值後，該儲存格離開編輯模式時。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control will attempt to convert a user-specified value displayed in a cell to an actual underlying cell value in the type specified by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項將會嘗試將使用者指定的值，顯示在資料格來實際基礎資料格的值之資料格所指定的型別轉換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This conversion uses the formatting properties of the cell style returned by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這項轉換會使用傳回的資料格的儲存格樣式的格式屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the standard conversion does not meet your needs, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing> event to provide custom value conversion to the required type.
trans-unit.target: 如果標準轉換不符合您的需求，處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>事件以提供自訂的值轉換為要求的類型。

trans-unit.source: Users can enter edit mode using the method specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode%2A> property, and can leave edit mode, committing any changes to a cell, by moving to another cell or by pressing ENTER.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以進入編輯模式，使用指定的方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode%2A>屬性，並且可以保留編輯模式中，資料格，以認可所有變更，將移到另一個資料格，或按下 ENTER 鍵。

trans-unit.source: Pressing ESC will revert any changes to the value before it is committed, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing> event will not occur.
trans-unit.target: 按下 esc 鍵將會還原為值的任何變更認可之前, 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>事件不會發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing> event occurs only if the cell value has actually been modified, even if the final value is the same as the original value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>事件時才會發生實際已修改資料格的值，即使最後的值時的原始值相同。

trans-unit.source: It also occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 它也會發生時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing> event, you can convert the value yourself or you can customize the default conversion.
trans-unit.target: 當您處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>事件，您可以自行轉換值，或您可以自訂預設轉換。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can convert the value yourself using the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A> method with type converters of your choosing.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以將值轉換自己使用資料格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A>使用類型轉換器，您所選擇的方法。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can let the default type converters parse the value, but modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.InheritedCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, which is initialized using the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以讓預設的類型轉換器剖析值，但修改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>屬性所傳回的物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.InheritedCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，使用儲存格初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When you convert the value yourself, replace the initial, formatted value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property with the converted value in the type specified by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當您自行轉換值時，取代初始，其格式的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性之資料格所指定的型別轉換的值與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To indicate that no further parsing is necessary, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要指出不再剖析是必要，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: When the event handler completes, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is `null` or is not of the correct type, or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> is parsed using the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A> method with default type converters.
trans-unit.target: 此事件處理常式完成時，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>是`null`或不正確的型別，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性是`false`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>使用資料格會剖析<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A>使用預設類型轉換器方法。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this method parses the value using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> properties of the cell style passed in.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的預設實作會剖析值使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>中傳遞的儲存格樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the value is not equal to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, the value is parsed using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> property and the type converters passed in.
trans-unit.target: 如果值不等於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>，這個值剖析使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>中傳遞的屬性和型別轉換子。

trans-unit.source: To customize the conversion of a cell value into a formatted value for display, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要自訂的資料格的值轉換為格式化的值來顯示，處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>事件。

trans-unit.source: It also shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 它也示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs>類別。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell state changes, such as when the cell loses or gains focus.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格狀態變更時發生，例如儲存格失去或獲得焦點時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用此事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style" /> 屬性變更時。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when any property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is set to a new value or when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is set to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object.
trans-unit.target: 時，就會發生此事件屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性設定為新值或當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性設定為新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>包含至少一個屬性值與上一個儲存格樣式物件不同。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStyleChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStyleChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStyleChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when one of the values of a cell style changes.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格樣式的其中一個值變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStyleContentChanged> event occurs when a property value of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by one of the following properties changes:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStyleContentChanged>屬性值時，就會發生事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>其中下列的屬性變更傳回的物件：

trans-unit.source: If one of these properties is set to a different <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>, however, the corresponding *PropertyName*`Changed` event occurs, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStyleContentChanged> event does not occur.
trans-unit.target: 如果其中一個屬性會設定為不同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>，不過對應*PropertyName* `Changed`就會發生事件，但<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStyleContentChanged>事件不會發生。

trans-unit.source: For row, column, and cell properties, the name of the *PropertyName*`Changed` event begins with "`Row`", "`Column`", or "`Cell`" (for example, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDefaultCellStyleChanged>).
trans-unit.target: 資料列、 資料行和資料格屬性的名稱*PropertyName* `Changed`事件開頭"`Row`"，"`Column`"，或"`Cell`"(例如， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDefaultCellStyleChanged>)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。
