trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell's ToolTip text is needed.
trans-unit.target: 需要儲存格的工具提示文字時發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>只發生事件時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>屬性設定或其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>屬性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event, the ToolTip text you specify in the handler is shown whenever the mouse pointer is over a cell and the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellToolTips%2A> property value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 當您處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>您指定的處理常式中的工具提示文字會顯示事件，每當滑鼠指標位於儲存格和控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellToolTips%2A>屬性值是`true`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event is useful when you want to display ToolTips determined by the current state or value of a cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>事件很實用，當您想要顯示由目前的狀態或儲存格的值決定的工具提示。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the mouse pointer enters a cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>事件也會發生值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>擷取屬性，或是以程式設計的方式，或當滑鼠指標進入儲存格。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> properties to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>屬性來判斷狀態或儲存格值，並使用此資訊來變更或修改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會初始化儲存格的值與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>事件值會覆寫的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A> value for multiple cells.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>事件時使用大量的資料，以避免效能的負面影響的設定儲存格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>多個資料格的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event handler to display information from hidden columns in a data-bound <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>資料繫結中顯示隱藏的資料行資訊的事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the cell has finished validating.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格完成驗證之後發生。

trans-unit.source: Handling this event is useful for post-validation processing of the cell value.
trans-unit.target: 處理此事件可用來驗證後置處理的資料格的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidated> event to clear out the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidated>來清除事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating> event sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> if the user enters data that is not valid into a cell.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating>事件設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>如果使用者輸入無效，無法在資料格中的資料。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell loses input focus, enabling content validation.
trans-unit.target: 發生於儲存格失去輸入焦點、啟用內容驗證時。

trans-unit.source: Canceling this event cancels the changes to the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 取消這個事件會取消目前儲存格的變更。

trans-unit.source: When this event is canceled in data-bound mode, the new value is not pushed to the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 此事件在資料繫結模式取消時，新的值不會發送到基礎資料來源。

trans-unit.source: When this event is canceled in virtual mode, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event will not be raised.
trans-unit.target: 當此事件會在虛擬模式中，取消<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>不會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidated> event to perform post-validation processing.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidated>事件來執行驗證後置處理。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example handles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating> event to ensure that only positive integers are entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating>事件以確保使用者所輸入的只是正整數。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> reference topic.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>參考主題。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of a cell changes.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格的值變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event occurs when the user-specified value is committed, which typically occurs when focus leaves the cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>認可，使用者指定的值時，就會發生事件這通常發生於焦點離開儲存格。

trans-unit.source: In the case of check box cells, however, you will typically want to handle the change immediately.
trans-unit.target: 在核取方塊儲存格，不過，您通常要立即處理此變更。

trans-unit.source: To commit the change when the cell is clicked, you must handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要在按下儲存格時，請認可變更，您必須處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: In the handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts.Commit> value.
trans-unit.target: 在處理常式中，核取方塊儲存格的目前儲存格時，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法並傳入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts.Commit>值。

trans-unit.source: Rows in the control are not automatically sorted when a cell value is changed.
trans-unit.target: 資料格的值變更時，不會自動排序控制項中的資料列。

trans-unit.source: To sort the control when the user modifies a cell, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A> method in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要在使用者修改資料格時，排序控制項，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A>方法中的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> event to update the values in a balance column of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged>事件，以更新中的餘額資料行的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control is <see langword="true" /> and the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> requires a value for a cell in order to format and display the cell.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true" />，且 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 需要有儲存格的值，才能格式化並顯示此儲存格時。

trans-unit.source: Use this event in virtual mode to populate cells with data from a custom data store without causing rows to become unshared.
trans-unit.target: 填入使用自訂資料存放區資料的資料格，而不會造成資料列變成非共用的虛擬模式中使用此事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關共用資料列的詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about virtual mode, see [Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需虛擬模式的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的虛擬模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: To add user-specified values to your custom data store, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要將使用者指定的值加入至您的自訂資料存放區中，處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example handles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded> event to populate cells with positive integers.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded>事件，以填入儲存格的正整數。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> reference topic.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>參考主題。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control is <see langword="true" /> and a cell value has changed and requires storage in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true" />，且儲存格值已變更，並需要在基礎資料來源中有儲存區時。

trans-unit.source: Use this event in virtual mode to update a custom data store with user-specified data.
trans-unit.target: 使用者指定的資料更新的自訂資料存放區中的虛擬模式使用此事件。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded> event to retrieve values from the data store for display in the control.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded>事件，以擷取控制項中顯示的資料存放區中的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information about virtual mode, see [Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需虛擬模式的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的虛擬模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example handles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event to store updates and new entries in a data store object.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>事件，以更新和新的項目儲存在資料存放區物件。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> reference topic.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>參考主題。

trans-unit.source: Cancels the selection of currently selected cells.
trans-unit.target: 取消選取目前已選取的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: Clears the current selection by unselecting all selected cells.
trans-unit.target: 取消選取所有選取的儲存格來清除目前的選取範圍。

trans-unit.source: When this method is called, each column and row's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫此方法時，每個資料行和資料列的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>屬性設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example clears the selection of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會同時清除選取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `dataGridView1` and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> named `clearSelectionButton`, and ensure all events are associated with their event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`dataGridView1`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>名為`clearSelectionButton`，並確定其事件處理常式相關聯的所有事件。

trans-unit.source: The column index to exclude.
trans-unit.target: 要排除的資料行索引。

trans-unit.source: The row index to exclude.
trans-unit.target: 要排除的資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to select the excluded cell, row, or column; <see langword="false" /> to retain its original state.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示選取被排除的儲存格、資料列或資料行，<see langword="false" /> 則表示保留其原始狀態。

trans-unit.source: Cancels the selection of all currently selected cells except the one indicated, optionally ensuring that the indicated cell is selected.
trans-unit.target: 取消選取目前已選取的所有儲存格 (除了指示的儲存格以外)，並選擇性地確定所指示的儲存格已選取。

trans-unit.source: A `rowIndexException` value of -1 represents a column header, and a `columnIndexException` value of -1 represents a row header.
trans-unit.target: A`rowIndexException`值為-1 表示資料行標頭，和`columnIndexException`值為-1 表示資料列標頭。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful to clear the current selection without canceling the selection of the cell, row, or column indicated by the exception indexes.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法很有用，但不取消選取的資料格、 資料列或例外狀況索引所指示的資料行中清除目前選取範圍。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property value allows individual cell selection, this method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Selected%2A> property of each cell to `false`, excluding the cell in the row and column specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>屬性值，可讓個別儲存格選取範圍，這個方法會設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Selected%2A>的每個資料格屬性`false`，排除資料列和資料行指定的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property value allows full row or column selection, this method also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> property of each row or column to `false`, excluding the row or column containing the specified cell.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>屬性值，可讓完整的資料列或資料行選取項目，這個方法也集<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>每個資料列或資料行的屬性`false`、 不含資料列或資料行，內含指定的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: The excluded cell, row, or column may or may not be in the selected state when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: 排除的資料格、 資料列或資料行可能會或可能未處於選取狀態時呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: This method selects it if the `selectExceptionElement` parameter value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會選取它如果`selectExceptionElement`參數值是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the selection mode, the entire row or column may also be selected as a result.
trans-unit.target: 根據選取模式，整個資料列或資料行可能也會選取結果。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="columnIndexException" /> is greater than the highest column index.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="columnIndexException" /> 大於最高的資料行索引。

trans-unit.source: -or-

<paramref name="columnIndexException" /> is less than -1 when <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode" /> is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.FullRowSelect" />; otherwise, <paramref name="columnIndexException" /> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode" /> 為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.FullRowSelect" /> 時，<paramref name="columnIndexException" /> 小於 -1；否則 <paramref name="columnIndexException" /> 小於 0。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="rowIndexException" /> is greater than the highest row index.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowIndexException" /> 大於最高的資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: -or-

<paramref name="rowIndexException" /> is less than -1 when <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode" /> is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.FullColumnSelect" />; otherwise, <paramref name="rowIndexException" /> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode" /> 為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.FullColumnSelect" /> 時，<paramref name="rowIndexException" /> 小於 -1；否則 <paramref name="rowIndexException" /> 小於 0。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether users can copy cell text values to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard" /> and whether row and column header text is included.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出使用者是否可以將儲存格文字值複製到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard" />，以及是否會包含資料列和資料行標頭文字。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode.EnableWithAutoHeaderText" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode.EnableWithAutoHeaderText" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control copies the text representation of each selected cell to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項將每個選取的資料格的文字表示法複製到剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: This value is the cell value converted to a string or, for image cells, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個值是資料格的值轉換成字串或影像資料格的值為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Values are copied to the Clipboard in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue> formats.
trans-unit.target: 值會複製到剪貼簿<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue>格式。

trans-unit.source: These formats are useful for pasting content into applications such as Notepad, [!INCLUDE[ofprexcel](~/includes/ofprexcel-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[ofprword](~/includes/ofprword-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 這些格式是用於將內容貼到 [記事本] 之類的應用程式[!INCLUDE[ofprexcel](~/includes/ofprexcel-md.md)]，和[!INCLUDE[ofprword](~/includes/ofprword-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control copies the cells contained in the smallest rectangle that includes all selected cells.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項複製包含所有選取的儲存格的最小矩形中包含的資料格。

trans-unit.source: Rows and columns that do not contain any selected cells are not represented in the copied data.
trans-unit.target: 資料列和資料行不包含任何選取的資料格不會出現在複製的資料中。

trans-unit.source: Any unselected cells in the remaining rows and columns are represented by blank placeholders.
trans-unit.target: 其餘的資料列和資料行中任何未選取資料格會以空白預留位置表示。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the copy mode and the selection mode, header values for the copied rows and columns may be copied, as well.
trans-unit.target: 根據複製模式和選取模式，複製的資料列和資料行的標頭值可能會複製，以及。

trans-unit.source: When users copy content, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control adds a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者複製內容，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項會將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>到剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: This data object is retrieved from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個資料物件會從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can call this method when you want to programmatically add the data object to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 當您想要以程式設計方式將資料物件加入至剪貼簿時，您可以呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A> method retrieves values for individual cells by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A>方法會擷取個別資料格的值，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can override either or both of these methods in derived classes to customize the layout of copied cells or to support additional data formats.
trans-unit.target: 您可以覆寫一個或兩個自訂複製的儲存格的版面配置，或以支援其他資料格式的衍生類別中的這些方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about Clipboard operations and data formats, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需剪貼簿 作業和資料格式的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to enable copying in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何啟用複製<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Enable Users to Copy Multiple Cells to the Clipboard from the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/enable-users-to-copy-multiple-cells-to-the-clipboard-datagridview.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 啟用的使用者複製多個儲存格至剪貼簿] 從 [Windows Form DataGridView 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/enable-users-to-copy-multiple-cells-to-the-clipboard-datagridview.md)。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時所指定的值不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a column is added to the control.
trans-unit.target: 資料行加入至控制項時發生。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of columns displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 中顯示的資料行數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of columns displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 中顯示的資料行數目。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A> property to 0 will remove all columns from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A>屬性設為 0 將會移除所有的資料行從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A> is reset to a value less than the current value, columns will be removed from the end of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A>會重設為值小於目前的值，就移除資料行從結尾<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A> is set to a value greater than the current value, columns will be added to the end of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A>設為比目前的值更大的值，將資料行加入至結尾<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A> property to create a simple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> for displaying and editing text.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可以搭配<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A>屬性來建立簡單<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>顯示和編輯文字。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.target: 此外，程式碼範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`dataGridView1`，然後呼叫`SetUpDataGridView`從表單的建構函式的方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnDisplayIndexChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnDisplayIndexChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks a divider between two columns.
trans-unit.target: 使用者按兩下兩個資料行之間的分割線時發生。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to customize the automatic sizing behavior that occurs when a user double-clicks a column divider.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用此事件來自訂發生於使用者按兩下資料行分割線的自動調整大小行為。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can handle this event to programmatically resize columns based only on the content in the rows that are currently visible, avoiding a performance impact with the default behavior when working with a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以處理這個事件來以程式設計方式調整大小資料行只會根據目前可見的資料列中的內容使用大量的資料列時，避免使用預設行為對效能產生影響。

trans-unit.source: The column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A> property does not extend the area in which a user can double-click.
trans-unit.target: 資料行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>屬性不會擴充的區域，使用者可以連按兩下。

trans-unit.source: If the width of a divider has been increased through the use of this property, this event occurs when the user double-clicks the boundary between the divider and the adjacent column.
trans-unit.target: 如果已透過這個屬性使用增加的分割線的寬度，當使用者按兩下分割線與相鄰的資料行之間的界限時，就會發生此事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks a column header.
trans-unit.target: 使用者按一下資料行行首時發生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: When a column heading is clicked in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, the default behavior is to order the grid rows based on the clicked column, or to reverse the sort order if the grid is already sorted by the clicked column.
trans-unit.target: 資料行標題中時按下<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>的預設行為是根據所按的資料行的方格資料列的順序，或反轉排序次序，如果按下的資料行的已排序方格。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use this event to perform a programmatic sort that emulates the default behavior of clicking a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> when the default behavior has been disabled.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個事件來執行模擬按一下的預設行為的程式設計排序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell>時已停用的預設行為。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.ColumnHeaderSelect>, so clicking the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> selects the contents of the column.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.ColumnHeaderSelect>，因此按一下<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell>選取資料行的內容。

trans-unit.source: For the example code to function as intended, the default column header click behavior needs to be changed each time the data is loaded into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 預設資料行標頭如預期般運作的範例程式碼中，按一下將資料載入每次變更的行為需求<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。

trans-unit.source: Add a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataBindingComplete> event handler to provide the code that changes the default behavior.
trans-unit.target: 新增<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataBindingComplete>提供變更的預設行為的程式碼的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `dataGridView1` and ensure that all events are associated with their event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`dataGridView1`，並確定其事件處理常式相關聯的所有事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the border style applied to the column headers.
trans-unit.target: 取得資料行行首所套用的框線樣式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> property is set to anything other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle.Single>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A> property must be a system color.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>以外屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle.Single>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A>屬性必須是系統色彩。

trans-unit.source: You cannot set this property to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle.Custom> value, which is a read-only value indicating that the border style has been customized through the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您無法將此屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle.Custom>值，這是唯讀，這個值表示，已使用自訂的框線樣式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If visual styles are enabled for the application through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A> property is `true`, the column headers are painted using the current theme.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟用視覺化樣式的應用程式透過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A>屬性是`true`，資料行標頭會使用目前的佈景主題來繪製。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> property is ignored for all column headers except the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>, to which the theme is not applied.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>以外的所有資料行標頭，則會都忽略屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>，不套用的佈景主題。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties.
trans-unit.target: 此外，程式碼範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named`dataGridView1`, and then call the `SetUpDataGridView` method from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`dataGridView1`，然後呼叫`SetUpDataGridView`從表單的建構函式的方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default column header style.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定預設資料行行首的樣式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> that represents the default column header style.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" />，表示預設資料行標頭樣式。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by this property has the following initial property values:
trans-unit.target: 預設值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>傳回由此屬性有下列的初始屬性值：

trans-unit.source: `DataGridViewCellStyle` property
trans-unit.target: `DataGridViewCellStyle` 屬性

trans-unit.source: Default value
trans-unit.target: 預設值

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.Control%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.Control%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.WindowText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.WindowText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.Highlight%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.Highlight%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Font%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Font%2A> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: These values automatically override the values set through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這些值會自動覆寫透過設定的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To force column headers to inherit the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> values, you must set the values in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> object to the default values indicated for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要強制繼承的資料行標頭<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>值，您必須設定的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>物件設為預設值所指示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>類別。

trans-unit.source: For more information about cell style inheritance, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需儲存格樣式繼承的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格樣式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: If visual styles are enabled and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A> is set to `true`, all header cells except the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A> are painted using the current theme and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> values are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟用視覺化樣式和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A>設`true`，以外的所有標頭資料格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>會使用目前的佈景主題來繪製和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>值會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when any properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> property is set to a new value or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> property is set to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object.
trans-unit.target: 時，就會發生此事件的屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>屬性設定為新值或當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>屬性設定為新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>包含至少一個屬性值不同於上一個儲存格樣式物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height, in pixels, of the column headers row
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料行行首的資料列高度 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the row that contains the column headers.
trans-unit.target: 包含資料行行首的資料列之高度 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The default is 23.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 23。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is less than the minimum height of 4 pixels or is greater than the maximum height of 32768 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時所指定的值小於最小高度 4 像素，或大於最大高度 32768 像素。

trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the height of the column headers is adjustable and whether it can be adjusted by the user or is automatically adjusted to fit the contents of the headers.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出資料行標頭的高度是否可以調整，以及使用者是否可以調整此高度，或是會配合標頭內容，自動調整此高度。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode" /> value indicating the mode by which the height of the column headers row can be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode" /> 值，指出資料行標頭資料列的高度可以根據哪一個模式來調整。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode.EnableResizing" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode.EnableResizing" />。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode.AutoSize>, the height of the column headers cannot be adjusted by the user.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode.AutoSize>，使用者不能調整資料行行首的高度。

trans-unit.source: To adjust the height of the column headers programmatically, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight%2A> method or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeight%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要以程式設計方式調整資料行行首的高度，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight%2A>方法或一組<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeight%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To set the sizing mode for the row headers, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定資料列標頭的大小調整模式，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when the column headers are resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.True>.
trans-unit.target: 對於儲存格的內容分成多行換行，資料行標頭會重新調整大小時，作用中的資料格的儲存格樣式必須<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>屬性值為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState.True>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about header sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需標頭的調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control does not support double buffering.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項不支援雙重緩衝。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A> is set to `true` in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, users will not receive visual feedback when resizing rows, columns, or headers or when reordering columns.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A>設`true`中衍生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項，使用者將不會收到的視覺化回饋時調整資料列、 資料行或標頭的大小，或重新排序資料行。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the column header row is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否顯示資料行行首的資料列。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the column headers are displayed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果會顯示資料行標頭，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersVisible%2A> property is `false`, a column whose <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Resizable%2A> property is set to `true` can still be resized in the user interface (UI) by clicking with the mouse cursor anywhere along the right border of the column to be resized.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersVisible%2A>屬性是`false`，資料行其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Resizable%2A>屬性設定為`true`仍能調整使用者介面 (UI) 中使用滑鼠游標右框線要調整大小之資料行上的任何位置按一下。

trans-unit.source: The following code example populates an unbound <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control and sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersVisible%2A> property to `true` to ensure that column headers are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會填入解除繫結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項和集合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersVisible%2A>屬性`true`以確保資料行標頭會顯示。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <see langword="false" /> and one or more columns have an <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode" /> property value of <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode.ColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: 當設定這個屬性時的指定值為 <see langword="false" />，而且有一個或多個資料行具有 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode" /> 的 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode.ColumnHeader" /> 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.MinimumWidth" /> property for a column changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於資料行的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.MinimumWidth" /> 屬性值變更時。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection that contains all the columns in the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含控制項中所有欄的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection" /> that contains all the columns in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection" />，包含 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項中的所有資料行。

trans-unit.source: By using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection> returned by this property, you can add columns, remove columns, and obtain a count of the columns contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection>傳回這個屬性，您可以將資料行加入、 移除資料行，並取得中所包含的資料行的計數<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create an unbound <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>; set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersVisible%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A> properties; and use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立未繫結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>; 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersVisible%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A>[屬性]，並使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to use a version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A> methods to properly size the column headers and the rows.
trans-unit.target: 它也會示範如何使用的版本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A>方法，以適當的設定資料行標頭和資料列大小。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `dataGridView1` and a button named `Button1`, and then call the `InitializeDataGridView` method from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到表單，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`dataGridView1`和名為按鈕`Button1`，然後呼叫`InitializeDataGridView`從表單的建構函式的方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件處理常式。
