trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSourceChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSourceChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default cell style to be applied to the cells in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> if no other cell style properties are set.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 中的儲存格所要套用的預設儲存格樣式 (前提是未設定其他儲存格樣式屬性)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> to be applied as the default style.
trans-unit.target: 要套用為預設樣式的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control displays its cells using the styles indicated by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property, which inherits styles from other properties of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項會顯示其使用由儲存格樣式的儲存格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>屬性，其他屬性的型別繼承樣式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>。

trans-unit.source: The styles specified through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property affect all cells except when overridden by the styles specified through the following properties:
trans-unit.target: 透過指定的樣式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>屬性會影響所有的資料格時覆寫下列屬性透過指定的樣式除外：

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格樣式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: When getting this property, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with default values will be created if the property has not already been accessed.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個屬性，當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>預設值將會建立值如果屬性已不被存取。

trans-unit.source: This can cause a performance impact when getting this property for many rows.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個屬性的多個資料列時，這可能會造成效能影響。

trans-unit.source: Whenever possible, use a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> to set this property for multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: 您應該盡可能使用單一<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>設定此屬性的多個資料列。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this property in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control intended primarily for display.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將說明中的此屬性使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項主要是供顯示。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the visual appearance of the control is customized in several ways and the control is configured for limited interactivity.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，自訂控制項的視覺外觀的數種方式，控制項設定為有限的互動性。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when any properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property are set to new values or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property is set to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object.
trans-unit.target: 時，就會發生此事件的屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>屬性都設為新值或當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>屬性設定為新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>包含至少一個屬性值不同於上一個儲存格樣式物件.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyleChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyleChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyleChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyleChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default initial size of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項的預設初始大小。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> representing the initial size of the control, which is 240 pixels wide by 150 pixels high.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，表示控制項的初始大小 (寬 240 像素乘以高 150 像素)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user enters the row for new records so that it can be populated with default values.
trans-unit.target: 使用者在資料列中輸入新記錄以便填入預設值時發生。

trans-unit.source: This event lets you populate the row for new records when the user enters the row.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可讓您填入新的記錄的資料列，當使用者輸入的資料列。

trans-unit.source: Initial values for the row come from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> returned by each column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 初始資料列的值來自於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>每個資料行所傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: In data bound mode, all cell values for data bound columns are stored in the external data source.
trans-unit.target: 在資料繫結模式中，所有資料格的資料繫結資料行儲存在外部資料來源的值。

trans-unit.source: When the user enters the row for new records, a new row is created in the data source before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultValuesNeeded> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者輸入新記錄的資料列時之前, 的資料來源中建立新的資料列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultValuesNeeded>就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: When you populate the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property in your event handler, the values are added directly to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 當您擴展<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性在事件處理常式中，這些值會加入至資料來源直接。

trans-unit.source: In virtual mode, after this event occurs, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event occurs for each cell in the new row so that you can store the default values in your custom data store.
trans-unit.target: 在虛擬模式中之後就會發生此事件，,<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>就會發生事件的新資料列中的每個資料格，讓您可以在您的自訂資料存放區中儲存的預設值。

trans-unit.source: Then, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded> event occurs for each cell in the new row, retrieving the values that you stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event, which are then displayed.
trans-unit.target: 然後，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded>中新的資料列，每一個資料格就會發生事件擷取的值儲存在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>事件，然後顯示。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how this event can be handled.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何處理此事件。

trans-unit.source: In the example, cells for the given columns are populated with default values.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，指定資料行的資料格會填入預設值。

trans-unit.source: For the `CustomerID` column, the value is retrieved from a separate method (not implemented) that generates a unique customer ID.
trans-unit.target: 如`CustomerID`資料行，此值會從不同的方法 （未實作） 會產生唯一的客戶識別碼。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, replace the column names with the names of the column objects from an actual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control and provide appropriate default values.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，資料行名稱的名稱取代實際的資料行物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制，並提供適當的預設值。

trans-unit.source: When specifying columns by name, you must use the name of the column object and not the column header text.
trans-unit.target: 當指定資料行名稱，您必須使用資料行物件，而不是資料行的標頭文字的名稱。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include partial columns in the displayed column count; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示在顯示的資料行計數中加入部分資料行；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of columns displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 傳回顯示給使用者的資料行數。

trans-unit.source: The number of columns displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 顯示給使用者的資料行數。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include partial rows in the displayed row count; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示在顯示的資料列計數中加入部分資料列，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of rows displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 傳回顯示給使用者的資料列數。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 顯示給使用者的資料列數。

trans-unit.source: Gets the rectangle that represents the display area of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示控制項顯示區域的矩形。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the display area of the control.
trans-unit.target: 表示控制項顯示區的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DisplayRectangle%2A> property returns the client rectangle of the display area of the control, not including the area occupied by any scroll bars that are showing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DisplayRectangle%2A>屬性會傳回控制項，不包含會顯示任何捲軸的區域的顯示區域的用戶端矩形。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DisplayRectangle" /> property in a derived class, use the base class's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DisplayRectangle" /> property to extend the base implementation.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DisplayRectangle" />屬性在衍生類別中，使用基底類別的<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DisplayRectangle" />屬性擴充的基底實作。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you must provide all the implementation.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您必須提供所有的實作。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，<see langword="false" /> 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> and its child controls and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，以及其子系的控制項，並會選擇性地釋放一些 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control hosted by the current cell, if a cell with an editing control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 如果具有編輯控制項的儲存格位於編輯模式下，則取得目前儲存格所裝載的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> hosted by the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 目前儲存格所裝載的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />。

trans-unit.source: If the cell is not in edit mode or the cell type does not accommodate an editing control, this property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料格不是處於編輯模式，或資料格類型並不支援編輯控制項，這個屬性會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to use this property in an overridden method of a custom cell type.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個屬性的自訂儲存格類型覆寫方法中。

trans-unit.source: In the example, a reference to the editing control is retrieved, cast to a custom editing control type, and then populated with the current value of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，編輯控制項的參考為擷取、 轉換成自訂的編輯控制項類型，，然後填入儲存格的目前值。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Host Controls in Windows Forms DataGridView Cells](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 在 Windows Form DataGridView 儲存格的主控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a control for editing a cell is showing.
trans-unit.target: 顯示編輯儲存格的控制項時發生。

trans-unit.source: You can handle this event to perform custom initialization of the editing control when a cell enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 您可以處理這個事件，儲存格進入編輯模式時執行的編輯控制項的自訂初始化。

trans-unit.source: To customize the display characteristics of the control, set the properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要自訂控制項的顯示特性，設定所傳回的物件的屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To perform other initialization, cast the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to the specific control type and access the members directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行其他初始化，將值轉型的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性設定為特定控制項類型，並直接存取的成員。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing> event to attach event-handlers to the events of the editing control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing>事件，以將事件處理常式附加至編輯控制項的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control hosts one editing control at a time, and reuses the editing control whenever the cell type does not change between edits.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項裝載一個編輯控制項一次，並重複使用的編輯控制項，只要編輯之間不會變更資料格類型。

trans-unit.source: When attaching event-handlers to the editing control, you must therefore take precautions to avoid attaching the same handler multiple times.
trans-unit.target: 時將事件處理常式附加至編輯控制項，因此您必須採取預防措施，以避免將相同的處理常式附加多次。

trans-unit.source: To avoid this problem, remove the handler from the event before you attach the handler to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免這個問題，請從前您附加至事件的處理常式的事件中移除處理常式。

trans-unit.source: This will prevent duplication if the handler is already attached to the event, but will have no effect otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 這將避免重複，如果此處理常式已附加至事件，但否則沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the example code in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的範例程式碼<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to handle this event to change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor%2A> property of the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何處理這個事件來變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor%2A>屬性的目前儲存格。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `dataGridView1` and ensure that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing> event is associated with the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`dataGridView1`，並確定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing>事件是否與此事件處理常式相關聯。

trans-unit.source: Gets the panel that contains the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl" /> 的面板。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Panel" /> that contains the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Panel" />，其中包含 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl" />。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A> property, which is `null` when the current cell is not in edit mode, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingPanel%2A> property is always available.
trans-unit.target: 不同於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A>屬性，這是`null`目前儲存格不是處於編輯模式時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingPanel%2A>屬性一律為可用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingPanel%2A> property in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control to visually differentiate a cell when it is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingPanel%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項以視覺化方式區分儲存格處於編輯模式時。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel.BorderStyle%2A> of the cell's editing panel is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle.Fixed3D>.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel.BorderStyle%2A>的儲存格的編輯面板設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle.Fixed3D>。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `dataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`dataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating how to begin editing a cell.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示要如何開始編輯儲存格。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode.EditOnKeystrokeOrF2" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode.EditOnKeystrokeOrF2" />。

trans-unit.source: All <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode> values except for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode.EditProgrammatically> also allow a user to double-click a cell to begin editing it.
trans-unit.target: 所有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode>值除了<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode.EditProgrammatically>也可讓使用者按兩下開始編輯儲存格。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a simple data-bound <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何初始化簡單資料繫結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 它也會示範如何設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時所指定的值不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property would cause the control to enter edit mode, but initialization of the editing cell value failed and either there is no handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> event or the handler has set the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> property to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時所指定的值會讓控制項進入編輯模式，但編輯儲存格值的初始設定失敗，而且 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> 事件沒有處理常式或處理常式已將 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> 屬性設定為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <see cref="T:System.FormatException" />.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況物件通常可轉換成 <see cref="T:System.FormatException" /> 類型。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditModeChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditModeChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether row and column headers use the visual styles of the user's current theme if visual styles are enabled for the application.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出已針對應用程式啟用視覺化樣式時，資料列和資料行行首是否使用使用者的目前佈景主題的視覺化樣式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if visual styles are enabled for the headers; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已為標頭啟用視覺化樣式，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: You can enable visual styles for your application by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method before calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以為您的應用程式啟用視覺化樣式，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法之前先呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A> is set to `true`, all header cells except the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A> are painted using the current theme.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A>設`true`，以外的所有標頭資料格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>會使用目前的佈景主題來繪製。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to disable visual styles for the row and column headers in an application that has visual styles enabled.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何停用的資料列和資料行標頭啟用視覺化樣式的應用程式中的視覺化樣式。

trans-unit.source: In this example, visual styles have been enabled for the application by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A> method in `Main`.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，視覺化樣式已啟用應用程式藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A>方法中的`Main`。

trans-unit.source: However, visual styles will not be applied to the row and column headers because <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A> is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 不過，視覺化樣式會套用至資料列和資料行標頭因為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A>設`false`。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle>類別。

trans-unit.source: Commits and ends the edit operation on the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 認可及結束目前儲存格上的編輯作業。

trans-unit.source: Commits and ends the edit operation on the current cell using the default error context.
trans-unit.target: 認可及結束使用預設錯誤內容的目前儲存格上的編輯作業。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the edit operation is committed and ended; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已經認可並結束編輯作業，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EndEdit%2A> overload, passing in a bitwise combination of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts.Parsing> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts.Commit> values.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EndEdit%2A>多載，傳入的位元組合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts.Parsing>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts.Commit>值。

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellEndEdit> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellEndEdit>事件。

trans-unit.source: This method may result in an exception if errors are not handled with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可能會導致例外狀況錯誤不會處理包含如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError>事件。

trans-unit.source: The cell value could not be committed and either there is no handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> event or the handler has set the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> property to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 無法認可儲存格值，<see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> 事件沒有處理常式，或處理常式已將 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> 屬性設定為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts" /> values that specifies the context in which an error can occur.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts" /> 值的位元 (Bitwise) 組合，指定可能發生錯誤的內容。

trans-unit.source: Commits and ends the edit operation on the current cell using the specified error context.
trans-unit.target: 認可及結束使用指定錯誤內容的目前儲存格上的編輯作業。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the edit operation is committed and ended; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已經認可並結束編輯作業，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellEndEdit> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellEndEdit>事件。

trans-unit.source: This method may result in an exception if errors are not handled with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可能會導致例外狀況錯誤不會處理包含如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError>事件。

trans-unit.source: The cell value could not be committed and either there is no handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> event or the handler has set the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> property to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 無法認可儲存格值，<see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> 事件沒有處理常式，或處理常式已將 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> 屬性設定為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the first cell currently displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />; typically, this cell is in the upper left corner.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前顯示在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 中的第一個儲存格；這個儲存格通常位於左上角。

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> currently displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: 目前顯示在控制項中的第一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine which cell is in the first row and column currently displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性來判斷哪一個儲存格是在第一個資料列和目前顯示在控制項中的資料行。

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is in the upper left corner, but for right-to-left languages, it is in the upper right corner.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，這是在左上角，但它是由右至左語言的右上角。

trans-unit.source: You can also set this property to scroll the control to the indicated cell.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以設定這個屬性，以將控制項捲動至指示的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to ensure that the current cell is visible after sorting.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何確保目前儲存格顯示完成排序之後。

trans-unit.source: This code works only with an unbound <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼僅適用於未繫結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: With a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control bound to an external data source, the current cell is not automatically persisted when sorting.
trans-unit.target: 與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項繫結至外部資料來源，目前儲存格不會自動保存排序時。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `dataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到表單，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`dataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: In C#, you must also connect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sorted> event to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 在 C# 中，您也必須連接<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sorted>事件，事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The specified cell when setting this property is not in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時，指定的儲存格不在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 中。

trans-unit.source: The specified cell when setting this property has a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.RowIndex" /> or <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex" /> property value of -1, indicating that it is a header cell or a shared cell.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時，指定儲存格的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.RowIndex" /> 或 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex" /> 屬性值為 -1，表示它是標題儲存格或共用的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The specified cell when setting this property has a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Visible" /> property value of <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時，指定儲存格的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Visible" /> 屬性值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the width of the portion of the column that is currently scrolled out of view..
trans-unit.target: 取得目前捲動到檢視範圍之外的資料行部分的寬度。

trans-unit.source: The width of the portion of the column that is scrolled out of view.
trans-unit.target: 捲動到檢視範圍之外的資料行部分的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the column that is the first column displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 上之第一個資料行的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the column that is the first column displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 顯示在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 上之第一個資料行的索引。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is less than 0 or greater than the number of columns in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時所指定的值小於 0 或大於控制項中的資料行數目減 1。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property indicates a column with a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible" /> property value of <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時的指定值表示具有 <see langword="false" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible" /> 屬性值之資料行。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The specified value when setting this property indicates a column with a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Frozen" /> property value of <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時的指定值表示具有 <see langword="true" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Frozen" /> 屬性值之資料行。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the row that is the first row displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 上之第一個資料列的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row that is the first row displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 顯示在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 上之第一個資料列的索引。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Scroll> event.
trans-unit.target: 設定此屬性將會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Scroll>事件。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is less than 0 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: 當屬性值設定為小於 0 或大於控制項中的資料列數目減 1 時的指定值。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property indicates a row with a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible" /> property value of <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時的指定值表示具有 <see langword="false" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible" /> 屬性值之資料列。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The specified value when setting this property indicates a column with a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Frozen" /> property value of <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時的指定值表示具有 <see langword="true" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Frozen" /> 屬性值之資料行。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font of the text displayed by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 顯示的文字字型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> to apply to the text displayed by the control.
trans-unit.target: 要套用至控制項顯示之文字的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont" /> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> property is an ambient property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>屬性是環境的屬性。

trans-unit.source: An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control.
trans-unit.target: 環境屬性是控制項屬性，如果未設定，將擷取從父控制項。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> will have the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> as its parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> by default.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>具有相同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>做為其父系<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>預設。

trans-unit.source: For more information about ambient properties, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties> class or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 如需環境屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>類別或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Drawing.Font> is immutable (meaning that you cannot adjust any of its properties), you can only assign the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> property a new <xref:System.Drawing.Font> object.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Drawing.Font>是不可變的 （表示您不能調整的任何屬性），您只能指派<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>新屬性<xref:System.Drawing.Font>物件。

trans-unit.source: However, you can base the new font on the existing font.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您可以根據現有的字型為新字型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control uses the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Font%2A> property as the default value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Font%2A> properties of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> objects returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項使用的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Font%2A>屬性的預設值為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Font%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>所傳回的物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Font%2A> value automatically updates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> properties, changing the font for any cell that inherits the value.
trans-unit.target: 變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Font%2A>值會自動更新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>內容，變更任何繼承值的資料格的字型。

trans-unit.source: Header cells override the value by default, and you can override the value for specific rows, columns, and cells.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，標頭資料格覆寫的值，您可以覆寫特定資料列、 資料行和資料格的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information about cell style inheritance, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需儲存格樣式繼承的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格樣式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Create an Unbound Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-create-an-unbound-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 建立未繫結的 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-create-an-unbound-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Font" /> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Font" /> 屬性值變更時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.FontChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.FontChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.FontChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.FontChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 的前景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the foreground color of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 的前景色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultForeColor" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultForeColor" /> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> property is an ambient property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>屬性是環境的屬性。

trans-unit.source: An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control.
trans-unit.target: 環境屬性是控制項屬性，如果未設定，將擷取從父控制項。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> will have the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> as its parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> by default.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>具有相同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>做為其父系<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>預設。

trans-unit.source: For more information about ambient properties, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties> class or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 如需環境屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>類別或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Drawing.Font> is immutable (meaning that you cannot adjust any of its properties), you can only assign the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> property a new <xref:System.Drawing.Font> object.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Drawing.Font>是不可變的 （表示您不能調整的任何屬性），您只能指派<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>新屬性<xref:System.Drawing.Font>物件。

trans-unit.source: However, you can base the new font on the existing font.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您可以根據現有的字型為新字型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control uses the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ForeColor%2A> property as the default value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.ForeColor%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項使用的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ForeColor%2A>屬性的預設值為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.ForeColor%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ForeColor%2A> value automatically updates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property, changing the foreground text color for any cell that inherits the value.
trans-unit.target: 變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ForeColor%2A>值會自動更新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>屬性，變更任何繼承值的資料格的前景文字色彩。

trans-unit.source: Header cells override the value by default, and you can override the value for specific rows, columns, and cells.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，標頭資料格覆寫的值，您可以覆寫特定資料列、 資料行和資料格的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information about cell style inheritance, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需儲存格樣式繼承的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格樣式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ForeColor" /> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ForeColor" /> 屬性值變更時。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ForeColorChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ForeColorChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="Int32" /> that identifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Int32" />，識別要擷取的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 擷取指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" />。

trans-unit.source: The specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" />。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> values specifying the cells to count.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> 值的位元 (Bitwise) 組合，可指定所要計數的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of cells that satisfy the provided filter.
trans-unit.target: 取得滿足提供的篩選條件的儲存格數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of cells that match the <paramref name="includeFilter" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 符合 <paramref name="includeFilter" /> 參數的儲存格數目。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful to determine the number of cells in a particular state.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是有助於判斷特定狀態中的資料格數目。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the number of selected cells, for example, use this method with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates.Selected?displayProperty=nameWithType> value.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取選取的資料格數目，例如，使用此方法時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates.Selected?displayProperty=nameWithType>值。

trans-unit.source: This is typically more efficient than using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這是通常更有效率使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to use this method to determine whether there are any cells selected in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個方法來判斷是否有中選取任何儲存格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: In this example, if any cells are selected, their values are retrieved through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A> method and displayed in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，如果未選取任何資料格，其值透過擷取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A>方法並顯示在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger example illustrating the use of the Clipboard features of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼是用法的剪貼簿功能之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Enable Users to Copy Multiple Cells to the Clipboard from the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/enable-users-to-copy-multiple-cells-to-the-clipboard-datagridview.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 啟用的使用者複製多個儲存格至剪貼簿] 從 [Windows Form DataGridView 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/enable-users-to-copy-multiple-cells-to-the-clipboard-datagridview.md)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="includeFilter" /> includes the value <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates.ResizableSet" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="includeFilter" /> 包括值 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates.ResizableSet" />。

trans-unit.source: The column index for the desired cell.
trans-unit.target: 所需儲存格的資料行索引。

trans-unit.source: The row index for the desired cell.
trans-unit.target: 所需儲存格的資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to return the displayed portion of the cell only; <see langword="false" /> to return the entire cell bounds.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示只傳回儲存格的顯示部分，而 <see langword="false" /> 表示傳回整個儲存格界限。

trans-unit.source: Returns the rectangle that represents the display area for a cell.
trans-unit.target: 傳回表示儲存格的顯示區域的矩形。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the display rectangle of the cell.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，表示儲存格的顯示矩形。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the entire cell bounds or the displayed portion only.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回整個儲存格界限或只顯示的部分。

trans-unit.source: To get the bounds of the cell contents only, use the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContentBounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得儲存格界限內容，使用資料格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContentBounds%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="columnIndex" /> is less than -1 or greater than the number of columns in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="columnIndex" /> 小於 -1 或大於控制項中的資料行數減 1。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="rowIndex" /> is less than -1 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> 小於 -1 或大於控制項中的資料列數減 1。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the formatted values that represent the contents of the selected cells for copying to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard" />.
trans-unit.target: 擷取格式化的值，該值表示要複製到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard" /> 之選定儲存格的內容。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject" /> that represents the contents of the selected cells.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject" />，表示選定儲存格的內容。

trans-unit.source: This method retrieves data that represents the region defined by the selected cells.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會擷取表示所選取的資料格定義的區域資料。

trans-unit.source: This region is the smallest rectangle that includes all of the selected cells.
trans-unit.target: 此區域是最小的矩形，其中包含所有選取的資料格。

trans-unit.source: The value for each selected cell in this region is retrieved by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 在此區域中的每個所選資料格的值藉由呼叫擷取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Blank placeholder values are used for unselected cells in this region.
trans-unit.target: 未選取的資料格，在此區域中，會使用空白預留位置值。

trans-unit.source: This method combines these values into a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> containing several formats for copying to the clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會結合這些值插入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>包含數種格式來複製到剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: The supported clipboard formats include <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 支援剪貼簿格式包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> 類別。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically add selected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> content to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式加入 選取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>到剪貼簿內容。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Enable Users to Copy Multiple Cells to the Clipboard from the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/enable-users-to-copy-multiple-cells-to-the-clipboard-datagridview.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 啟用的使用者複製多個儲存格至剪貼簿] 從 [Windows Form DataGridView 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/enable-users-to-copy-multiple-cells-to-the-clipboard-datagridview.md)。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClipboardCopyMode" /> is set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode.Disable" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClipboardCopyMode" /> 設定為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode.Disable" />。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to provide customized clipboard values.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法以提供自訂剪貼簿值。

trans-unit.source: This is useful, for example, to support copying values from custom cell types.
trans-unit.target: 這是很有用，例如，支援從自訂儲存格類型複製值。

trans-unit.source: The column index for the desired cell.
trans-unit.target: 所需儲存格的資料行索引。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to return the column rectangle visible in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> bounds; <see langword="false" /> to return the entire column rectangle.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示傳回 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 範圍內可見的資料行矩形，<see langword="false" /> 則表示傳回整個資料行矩形。

trans-unit.source: Returns the rectangle that represents the display area for a column, as determined by the column index.
trans-unit.target: 傳回表示資料行的顯示區域的矩形，這是由資料行索引所決定。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the display rectangle of the column.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，表示資料行的顯示矩形。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="columnIndex" /> is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of columns minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="columnIndex" /> 不在 0 到資料行數目減 1 的有效範圍內。

trans-unit.source: The row index for the desired cell.
trans-unit.target: 所需儲存格的資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to return the row rectangle visible in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> bounds; <see langword="false" /> to return the entire row rectangle.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示傳回 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 範圍內可見的資料列矩形，<see langword="false" /> 則表示傳回整個資料列矩形。

trans-unit.source: Returns the rectangle that represents the display area for a row, as determined by the row index.
trans-unit.target: 傳回表示資料列的顯示區域的矩形，這是由資料列索引所決定。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the display rectangle of the row.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，表示資料列的顯示矩形。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of rows minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> 不在 0 到資料列數目減 1 的有效範圍內。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the grid lines separating the cells of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定區隔 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 儲存格的格線色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> or <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SystemColors" /> that represents the color of the grid lines.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SystemColors" />，表示格線色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Drawing.KnownColor.ControlDarkDark" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Drawing.KnownColor.ControlDarkDark" />。

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A> property to any color when you use a single border; with other types of borders, the colors are specified by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A>屬性任何色彩的時機使用單一框線，則為與其他類型的框線，作業系統所指定的色彩。

trans-unit.source: If visual styles are enabled for the application through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A> property is ignored, and the current theme's colors are used.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟用視覺化樣式的應用程式透過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A>屬性會忽略，而使用的目前佈景主題色彩。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties.
trans-unit.target: 此外，程式碼範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `dataGridView1`, and then call the `SetUpDataGridView` method from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`dataGridView1`，然後呼叫`SetUpDataGridView`從表單的建構函式的方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Ensure all events are associated with their event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 請確定所有事件都都具有其事件處理常式相關聯。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時所指定的值是 <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The specified value when setting this property has a <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Color.A" /> property value that is less that 255.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時所指定之值的 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Color.A" /> 屬性值小於 255。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColorChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColorChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColorChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColorChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate.
trans-unit.target: x 座標。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate.
trans-unit.target: y 座標。

trans-unit.source: Returns location information, such as row and column indices, given x- and y-coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 在給定 x 和 y 座標的情況下傳回位置資訊，例如，資料列和資料行的索引。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo" /> that contains the location information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo" />，包含位置資訊。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to determine which part of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is located at the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法來判斷哪一個部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項位於指定座標位置。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can call this method—specifying the coordinates of a mouse click—to determine the row and column indexes of the clicked cell or whether a header cell or scroll bar was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以呼叫這個方法 — 指定點選滑鼠座標： 判斷按下儲存格，或是否已按下標頭資料格或捲動列的資料列和資料行索引。

trans-unit.target: 控制項要水平捲動的像素數。

trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料列外觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時所指定的值小於 0。

trans-unit.source: Invalidates a cell in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />, forcing it to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: 使 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 中的儲存格失效，以強制重新繪製該儲存格。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: 要使其失效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />。

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the specified cell of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />, forcing it to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: 使 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 的指定儲存格失效，以強制重新繪製該儲存格。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful to force a cell repaint in conditions that would not normally cause a cell to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是以強制重新繪製儲存格通常不會導致重新繪製該儲存格的狀況中很有用。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use this method with a custom cell type that changes its appearance as a result of external events.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用這個方法會變更其外觀外部事件的自訂儲存格類型。

trans-unit.source: For more information about painting and invalidation, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需繪製和失效的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to use this method in a customized <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> that is painted with a custom border when the mouse pointer rests on it.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個方法中的自訂<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>，當滑鼠指標停留在其上繪製有自訂框線。

trans-unit.source: In the example, the cell is invalidated when the mouse pointer enters or leaves it.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，當滑鼠指標進入或離開失效的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger example available in [How to: Customize Cells and Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control by Extending Their Behavior and Appearance](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-cells-and-columns-in-the-datagrid-by-extending-behavior.md).
