trans-unit.source: Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />
trans-unit.target: 權限的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> values that represents the key or keys to process.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> 值的位元 (Bitwise) 組合，表示要處理的按鍵。

trans-unit.source: Processes the UP ARROW key.
trans-unit.target: 處理向上鍵。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the key was processed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已處理按鍵，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The UP ARROW key would cause the control to enter edit mode, but the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType" /> property of the new current cell does not indicate a class that derives from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> and implements <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 向上鍵會使控制項進入編輯模式，但是新目前儲存格的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType" /> 屬性不會指出衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> 並實作 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl" /> 的類別。

trans-unit.source: This action would commit a cell value or enter edit mode, but an error in the data source prevents the action and either there is no handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> event or the handler has set the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> property to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個動作會認可儲存格值或進入編輯模式，但是資料來源中的錯誤會阻止這個動作，而且 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> 事件沒有處理常式或處理常式已將 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> 屬性設定為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: for calling unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用於呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 權限的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> values that represents the key or keys to process.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> 值的位元 (Bitwise) 組合，表示要處理的按鍵。

trans-unit.source: Processes the 0 key.
trans-unit.target: 處理 0 鍵。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the key was processed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已處理按鍵，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The 0 key would cause the control to enter edit mode, but the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType" /> property of the current cell does not indicate a class that derives from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> and implements <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 0 鍵會使控制項進入編輯模式，但是目前儲存格的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType" /> 屬性不會指出衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> 並實作 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl" /> 的類別。

trans-unit.source: This action would cause the control to enter edit mode, but an error in the data source prevents the action and either there is no handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> event or the handler has set the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> property to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個動作會使控制項進入編輯模式，但是因為資料來源中有錯誤，所以無法執行這個動作，而且不是沒有 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> 事件的處理常式，就是處理常式已將 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> 屬性設為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: for calling unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用於呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 權限的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can edit the cells of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出使用者是否可以編輯 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user cannot edit the cells of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者不能編輯 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項的儲存格，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A cell is read-only if the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ReadOnly%2A> property is `true` for the cell, the cell's row, the cell's column, or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 資料格為唯讀如果的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ReadOnly%2A>屬性是`true`資料格、 資料格的資料列儲存格的資料行，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this property in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control intended primarily for display.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將說明中的此屬性使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項主要是供顯示。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the visual appearance of the control is customized in several ways and the control is configured for limited interactivity.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，自訂控制項的視覺外觀的數種方式，控制項設定為有限的互動性。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <see langword="true" />, the current cell is in edit mode, and the current cell contains changes that cannot be committed.
trans-unit.target: 當設定這個屬性時的指定值為 <see langword="true" />、目前的儲存格位於編輯模式中，而且目前的儲存格包含無法認可的變更。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property would cause the control to enter edit mode, but initialization of the editing cell value failed and either there is no handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> event or the handler has set the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> property to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時所指定的值會讓控制項進入編輯模式，但編輯儲存格值的初始設定失敗，而且 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> 事件沒有處理常式或處理常式已將 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> 屬性設定為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <see cref="T:System.FormatException" />.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況物件通常可轉換成 <see cref="T:System.FormatException" /> 類型。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ReadOnly" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ReadOnly" /> 屬性變更時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ReadOnlyChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ReadOnlyChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ReadOnlyChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ReadOnlyChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the value of the current cell with the underlying cell value when the cell is in edit mode, discarding any previous value.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格在編輯模式下時，使用基礎儲存格值重新整理目前儲存格的值，並捨棄先前的任何值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if successful; <see langword="false" /> if a <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> event occurred.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功，則為 <see langword="true" />；如果發生 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> 事件，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Call this method to force a cell to update its display value in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法，以強制更新處於編輯模式下顯示值的資料格。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when an external process modifies the cell value and you want to notify the user of the change, even when a user-specified change is lost as a result.
trans-unit.target: 當外部處理序會修改儲存格的值，而且您想要通知使用者變更，即使使用者指定的變更將會遺失如此一來，這非常有用。

trans-unit.source: Resets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Text" /> property to its default value.
trans-unit.target: 重設 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Text" /> 屬性為其預設值。

trans-unit.source: Although this method behaves as described, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Text%2A> property is not relevant for this control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的行為如所述，雖然<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Text%2A>屬性對這個控制項無關。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip" /> 屬性變更時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row's shortcut menu is needed.
trans-unit.target: 發生於需要資料列的捷徑功能表時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>只發生事件時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>屬性設定或其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>屬性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event is useful when you want to display a shortcut menu determined by a row's current state or the values it contains.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>事件很實用，當您想要顯示的捷徑功能表，取決於資料列的目前狀態或包含的值。

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event, the shortcut menu that you specify in the handler is shown whenever the user right-clicks a row unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> overrides the shortcut menu for the specific cell that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 當您處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>您指定的處理常式中的捷徑功能表會顯示事件，每當使用者以滑鼠右鍵按一下資料列除非<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>覆寫已按下的特定資料格的捷徑功能表。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the user right-clicks a row.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>事件也會發生值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>擷取屬性，或是以程式設計的方式，或當使用者按一下滑鼠右鍵資料列。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to determine the state of a row or the values it contains, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性來判斷的值或資料列的狀態變更或修改使用這項資訊<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會使用資料列的值初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>事件值會覆寫的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> value for multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>事件時使用大量的資料，以避免效能的負面影響的資料列設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>多個資料列的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example handles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event to provide a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip> based on the title of the employee.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>事件以提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>根據員工的標題。

trans-unit.source: In this example, there are two shortcut menus, one for managers and one for all other employees.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，有兩個捷徑功能表，一個管理員，一個用於所有其他員工。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of rows displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 中顯示的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows to display in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 中的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A> is set to a value less than the current value, rows will be removed from the end of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A>設定的值小於目前的值，以資料列會移除結尾<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A> is set to a value greater than the current value, rows will be added to the end of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A>設為大於目前的值的值，資料列會加入至結尾<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: The additional rows are based on the row specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 其他資料列會根據中指定的資料列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A> property to 0, all rows will be removed from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A>屬性設為 0，所有資料列會移除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。

trans-unit.source: This is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 這就相當於呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A> is `true`, you cannot set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A> to 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>是`true`，您不能設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A>設為 0。

trans-unit.source: In this case, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to remove all rows except the row for new records.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法來移除新記錄的資料列以外的所有資料列。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A> has the same result as setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A> to 1 in this case, but is much faster.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Clear%2A>具有相同的結果做為設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A>1 在此情況下，但是會更快。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A> property can be used with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A> property to create a simple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> for displaying and editing text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A>屬性可以搭配<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A>屬性來建立簡單<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>顯示和編輯文字。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A> property to a value greater than 0 for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control without columns, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn> is added automatically.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A>屬性設為大於 0 的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>不使用資料行，控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn>會自動加入。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: In this example, this property is used to track the number of entries in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，這個屬性用來追蹤中的項目數<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時所指定的值小於 0。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The specified value is less than 1 and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows" /> is set to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定值小於 1，而且 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows" /> 設定為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: When setting this property, the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource" /> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 當設定這個屬性時，已經設定了 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle" /> property for a row changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於資料列的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle" /> 屬性值變更時。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when any property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property for a row is set to a new value or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property for a row is set to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object.
trans-unit.target: 時，就會發生此事件屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A>屬性資料列設定為新的值，或當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A>的資料列的屬性設定為新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>包含至少一個屬性值不同於上一個儲存格style 物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDefaultCellStyleChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDefaultCellStyleChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDefaultCellStyleChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDefaultCellStyleChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control is <see langword="true" /> and the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> needs to determine whether the current row has uncommitted changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true" />，且 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 需要判斷目前的資料列是否有未經認可的變更時。

trans-unit.source: By default, this event sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to `true` if any cells in the current row have been modified.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，此事件設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性`true`如果已修改目前的資料列中的任何資料格。

trans-unit.source: This causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CancelRowEdit> event to occur when the user reverts edits to a row.
trans-unit.target: 這會導致<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CancelRowEdit>事件發生時使用者會還原到資料列的編輯。

trans-unit.source: Users can revert edits to a row by pressing ESC twice when a cell is in edit mode or once outside of edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以編輯內容還原到一個資料列兩次時儲存格處於編輯模式，或一次編輯模式之外，請按下 esc 鍵。

trans-unit.source: This event can be used for customizing commit scope in virtual mode by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to the correct value depending on the chosen commit scope.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可用來設定自訂的虛擬模式中的認可範圍<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性設為正確的值，視所選擇的認可範圍而定。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to handle this event to provide cell-level commit scope, meaning that the user can revert changes to the current cell only.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何處理這個事件來提供資料格層級認可範圍，這表示使用者可以還原目前的儲存格的變更。

trans-unit.source: In cell-level commit scope, the row is treated as having uncommitted changes only when the current cell has uncommitted changes, rather than when any cell in the row has uncommitted changes.
trans-unit.target: 在認可資料格層級範圍內，資料列會被視為有未經認可變更時，才目前儲存格有未認可的變更，而不是當資料列中的任何資料格有未認可的變更。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [Walkthrough: Implementing Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/implementing-virtual-mode-wf-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[逐步解說： 在 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中實作虛擬模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/implementing-virtual-mode-wf-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks the divider between two rows.
trans-unit.target: 使用者按兩下兩列資料列之間的分割線時發生。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to customize the automatic sizing behavior that occurs when a user double-clicks a row divider.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用此事件來自訂發生於使用者按兩下資料列分割線的自動調整大小行為。

trans-unit.source: The row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A> property does not extend the area in which a user can double-click.
trans-unit.target: 資料列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>屬性不會擴充的區域，使用者可以連按兩下。

trans-unit.source: If the height of a divider has been increased through the use of this property, this event occurs when the user double-clicks the boundary between the divider and the adjacent column.
trans-unit.target: 如果已透過這個屬性使用增加的分割線的高度，當使用者按兩下分割線與相鄰的資料行之間的界限時，就會發生此事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight" /> 屬性變更時。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row receives input focus but before it becomes the current row.
trans-unit.target: 發生於資料列收到輸入焦點，但尚未變成目前的資料列之前。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is initially loaded, as well as when the user selects a row other than the current row.
trans-unit.target: 就會發生此事件時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>一開始載入時，以及當使用者選取目前的資料列以外的資料列。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentRow%2A> property is updated.
trans-unit.target: 此事件之前發生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentRow%2A>更新屬性。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the index of the newly-entered row, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property within the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取新輸入資料列的索引，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>內的事件處理常式屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to handle this event to change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor%2A> property of the cells in the current row.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何處理這個事件來變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor%2A>中目前資料列的資料格屬性。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the background color is set in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowEnter> event, then reset to <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty> on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowLeave> event.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，背景色彩設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowEnter>事件，然後重設為<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty>上<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowLeave>事件。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `dataGridView1`, and ensure that all events are associated with their event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`dataGridView1`，並確保其事件處理常式相關聯的所有事件。

trans-unit.target: 發生於資料列的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText" /> 屬性變更時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row's error text is needed.
trans-unit.target: 發生於需要資料列的錯誤文字時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>只發生事件時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項設定或其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>屬性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event is useful when you want to determine the error for a row depending on its state and the values it contains.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>事件很實用，當您想要判斷視其狀態和它所包含的值而定的資料列的錯誤。

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event and specify error text in the handler, an error glyph appears in the row header unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowRowErrors%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 當您處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>事件，並指定錯誤文字中處理常式中，資料列標頭顯示錯誤圖像除非<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowRowErrors%2A>屬性設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the user moves the mouse pointer over the error glyph, the error text appears in a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者將滑鼠指標移錯誤圖像時，錯誤文字會出現在工具提示中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>事件也會發生值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>擷取屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to determine the state of a row or the values it contains, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性來判斷的值或資料列的狀態變更或修改使用這項資訊<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會使用資料列的值初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>事件值會覆寫的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> value for multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>事件時使用大量的資料，以避免效能的負面影響的資料列設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>多個資料列的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of the row header cells.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料列行首儲存格的框線樣式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> property is set to anything other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle.Single>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A> property must be a system color.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A>以外屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle.Single>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A>屬性必須是系統色彩。

trans-unit.source: You cannot set this property to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle.Custom> value, which is a read-only value indicating that the border style has been customized through the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您無法將此屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle.Custom>值，這是唯讀，這個值表示，已使用自訂的框線樣式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If visual styles are enabled for the application through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A> property is `true`, the row headers are painted using the current theme.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟用視覺化樣式的應用程式透過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A>屬性是`true`，資料列標頭會使用目前的佈景主題來繪製。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> property is ignored for all row headers except the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>, to which the theme is not applied.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A>所有資料列以外的標頭，則會忽略屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>，不套用的佈景主題。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by this property has the following initial property values.
trans-unit.target: 預設值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>傳回由此屬性有下列的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: DataGridViewCellStyle property
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewCellStyle 屬性

trans-unit.source: Default value
trans-unit.target: 預設值

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.Control%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.Control%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.WindowText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.WindowText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.Highlight%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Font%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Font%2A> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: These values automatically override the values set through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這些值會自動覆寫透過設定的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To force row headers to inherit the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> values, you must set the values in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> object to the default values indicated for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要強制繼承的資料列標頭<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>值，您必須設定的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>物件設為預設值所指示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>類別。

trans-unit.source: For more information about cell style inheritance, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需儲存格樣式繼承的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格樣式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when a property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> property is set to a new value or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> property is set to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the column that contains row headers is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否顯示包含資料列行首的資料行。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the column that contains row headers is displayed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果顯示包含資料列標頭的資料行，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A> property is `false`, a row whose <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Resizable%2A> property is set to `true` can still be resized in the user interface (UI) by clicking the mouse cursor anywhere along the bottom border of the row to be resized.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A>屬性是`false`，一個資料列的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Resizable%2A>屬性設定為`true`仍能調整使用者介面 (UI) 中按一下任何位置沿著底部框線要調整大小的資料列的滑鼠游標。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties.
trans-unit.target: 此外，程式碼範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `dataGridView1`, and then call the `SetUpDataGridView` method from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`dataGridView1`，然後呼叫`SetUpDataGridView`從表單的建構函式的方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Ensure all events are associated with their event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 請確定所有事件都都具有其事件處理常式相關聯。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <see langword="false" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode" /> property is set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.AllHeaders" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.DisplayedHeaders" />.
trans-unit.target: 當設定這個屬性時的指定值為 <see langword="false" />，而且 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode" /> 屬性設定為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.AllHeaders" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.DisplayedHeaders" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width, in pixels, of the column that contains the row headers.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定包含資料列行首的資料行寬度 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the column that contains row headers.
trans-unit.target: 包含資料列行首的資料行之寬度 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The default is 43.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 43。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidth%2A> property can be used to resize the row header column to a specified width.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidth%2A>屬性可以用來調整資料列標題資料行指定寬度。

trans-unit.source: To adjust the width of this column to fit the contents of the row header cells, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRowHeadersWidth%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要調整此欄位至最適大小的資料列標題儲存格內容的寬度，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRowHeadersWidth%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidth%2A> property in a row-painting scenario.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidth%2A>列繪製案例中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: In the example, the value of this property is used to calculate the bounds within which a custom background is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，這個屬性的值用來計算在其中繪製自訂背景的界限。

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger example available in[How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料列外觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is less than the minimum width of 4 pixels or is greater than the maximum width of 32768 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時所指定的值小於最小寬度 4 像素，或大於最大寬度 32768 像素。

trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidth" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the width of the row headers is adjustable and whether it can be adjusted by the user or is automatically adjusted to fit the contents of the headers.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出資料列標頭的寬度是否可以調整，以及使用者是否可以調整此寬度，或是會配合標頭內容，自動調整此寬度。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> value indicating the mode by which the width of the row headers can be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> 值，指出資料列標頭的寬度可以根據哪一個模式來調整。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.EnableResizing" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.EnableResizing" />。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to an automatic sizing mode, the width of the row headers cannot be adjusted by the user.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性設定為自動調整大小模式時，使用者不能調整資料列行首的寬度。

trans-unit.source: To adjust the height of the row headers programmatically, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRowHeadersWidth%2A> method or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidth%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要以程式設計方式調整資料列行首的高度，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRowHeadersWidth%2A>方法或一組<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidth%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To set the sizing mode for the column headers, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定資料行標頭的調整模式，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about header sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需標頭的調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control does not support double buffering.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項不支援雙重緩衝。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A> is set to `true` in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, users will not receive visual feedback when resizing rows, columns, or headers or when reordering columns.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A>設`true`中衍生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項，使用者將不會收到的視覺化回饋時調整資料列、 資料行或標頭的大小，或重新排序資料行。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性來<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項主要是供顯示。

trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，自訂控制項的視覺外觀的數種方式，控制項設定為有限的互動性。

trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>類別概觀。

trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時所指定的值不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.target: 發生於資料列的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Height" /> 屬性值變更時。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用此事件。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料列外觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when information about row height is requested.
trans-unit.target: 要求有關資料列高度的資訊時發生。

trans-unit.source: This event is useful for preserving custom row heights after a sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可用於排序作業之後保留自訂的資料列的高度。

trans-unit.source: This is necessary because sorting operations are normally handled by the data source, which does not keep track of the correspondence between rows of data and rows in the control.
trans-unit.target: 這是必要的因為排序作業通常會由資料來源不會不追蹤的資料列與控制項中的資料列之間的對應。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property has been set or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 只會發生此事件時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>屬性已設定或當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>屬性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: In the latter case, you provide your own data store and sorting operations.
trans-unit.target: 在後者的情況下，您可以提供您自己的資料存放區和排序作業。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoPushed> event to store updated height information when the user changes a row height.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoPushed>事件儲存在使用者變更資料列高度時的更新的高度資訊。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoNeeded> to retrieve the stored height information when the control needs it.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoNeeded>控制項需要它時，擷取預存的高度資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoNeeded> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoNeeded>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user changes the height of a row.
trans-unit.target: 使用者變更資料列的高度時發生。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is set to `true` or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set to a value other than `null`.
trans-unit.target: 會引發這個事件時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>屬性設定為`true`或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>以外屬性設定為值`null`。

trans-unit.source: This event is used to track and store row height information so that it can be restored after a sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: 此事件用來追蹤和儲存資料列高度的資訊，讓它可以在排序作業之後還原。

trans-unit.source: To restore height information, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoNeeded> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要還原高度的資訊，請處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoNeeded>事件。

trans-unit.source: Note that this event occurs only when the user changes the height of a row.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，只有當使用者變更資料列高度時，才發生此事件。

trans-unit.source: If you change the height of a row programmatically, you must store the new height information at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 如果您以程式設計方式變更資料列高度，您必須儲存在同一時間的新高度資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoPushed> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoPushed>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row loses input focus and is no longer the current row.
trans-unit.target: 資料列失去輸入焦點且不再是目前資料列時發生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to handle this event to change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor%2A> property of the cells in the current row.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何處理這個事件來變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor%2A>中目前資料列的資料格屬性。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the background color is set in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowEnter> event, then reset to <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty> on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowLeave> event.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，背景色彩設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowEnter>事件，然後重設為<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty>上<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowLeave>事件。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `dataGridView1` and ensure that all events are associated with their event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`dataGridView1`，並確定其事件處理常式相關聯的所有事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.MinimumHeight" /> property for a row changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於資料列的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.MinimumHeight" /> 屬性值變更時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowMinimumHeightChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowMinimumHeightChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowMinimumHeightChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowMinimumHeightChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> is painted.
trans-unit.target: 發生在繪製 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> 之後。

trans-unit.source: You can handle this event alone or in combination with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint> event to customize the appearance of rows in the control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以處理這個事件，單獨使用或搭配<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint>事件，以自訂控制項中的資料列的外觀。

trans-unit.source: You can paint entire rows yourself, or paint specific parts of rows and use the following methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs> class to paint other parts:
trans-unit.target: 您可以繪製整個資料列，您自己，或 [小畫家] 的資料列的特定部分，並使用下列方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs>來繪製其他部分的類別：

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> class to paint standard controls using the current theme.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>類別來繪製標準控制項使用的目前佈景主題。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[視覺化樣式呈現控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。

trans-unit.source: If you are using [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], you also have access to a large library of standard images that you can use with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，您也可以存取的標準映像，您可以使用大型的程式庫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint> event to paint textual content that spans the entire row below the normal cell values.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用的處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint>來繪製文字的內容跨越的一般資料格值下方的整個資料列的事件。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料列外觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> is painted
trans-unit.target: 發生在繪製 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> 之前。

trans-unit.source: You can handle this event alone or in combination with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint> event to customize the appearance of rows in the control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以處理這個事件，單獨使用或搭配<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint>事件，以自訂控制項中的資料列的外觀。

trans-unit.source: You can paint entire rows yourself, or paint specific parts of rows and use the following methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs> class to paint other parts:
trans-unit.target: 您可以繪製整個資料列，您自己，或 [小畫家] 的資料列的特定部分，並使用下列方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs>來繪製其他部分的類別：

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> class to paint standard controls using the current theme.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>類別來繪製標準控制項使用的目前佈景主題。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[視覺化樣式呈現控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。

trans-unit.source: If you are using [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], you also have access to a large library of standard images that you can use with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，您也可以存取的標準映像，您可以使用大型的程式庫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint> event to paint a gradient row background if the row is selected.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用的處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint>來繪製背景漸層的資料列，如果在選取的資料列的事件。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料列外觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection that contains all the rows in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合，其中包含 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項中的所有資料列。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection" /> that contains all the rows in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection" />，包含 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 中的所有資料列。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> collection to manually populate a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control instead of binding it to a data source.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>手動填入集合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>而不是繫結至資料來源的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows you how to manually add and insert rows.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何以手動方式加入和插入資料列。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that you have added four <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn> instances to the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設您已加入四個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn>至控制項的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: For a detailed example that programmatically populates an unbound <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, see the Example section.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細的範例，以程式設計方式填入解除繫結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節。

trans-unit.source: Rows include style information in addition to cell values.
trans-unit.target: 資料列包含資料格的值以外的樣式資訊。

trans-unit.source: For this reason, you might want to add or insert rows based on existing rows that you have already styled.
trans-unit.target: 基於這個理由，您可能想要加入或插入資料列，根據現有的資料列已設定樣式。

trans-unit.source: You can do this using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.AddCopy%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.AddCopies%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.InsertCopy%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.InsertCopies%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.AddCopy%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.AddCopies%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.InsertCopy%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.InsertCopies%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> collection to modify the values in the control or to remove rows.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>修改控制項中的值，或移除資料列的集合。

trans-unit.source: You can modify values or remove rows regardless of whether the control is bound to an external data source.
trans-unit.target: 您可以修改值，或移除資料列，不論是否在控制項繫結至外部資料來源。

trans-unit.source: If there is a data source, the changes are made directly to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有資料來源，會直接變更資料來源。

trans-unit.source: You may still need to push the data source updates to a remote database, however.
trans-unit.target: 您可能仍然需要將資料來源更新推送至遠端資料庫，不過。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Bind Data to the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-data-to-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 將資料繫結至 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-data-to-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows you how to modify cell values programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何以程式設計方式修改資料格的值。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the standard collection capabilities, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> collection to retrieve information about rows.
trans-unit.target: 除了標準的集合的功能，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>来擷取的資料列的相關資訊集合。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowState%2A> method to determine the state of a particular row.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowState%2A>方法，以判斷特定的資料列的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowCount%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowsHeight%2A> methods to determine the number of rows or the combined height of rows in a particular state.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowCount%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowsHeight%2A>方法來判斷資料列數目或結合的特定狀態中的資料列高度。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the index of a row with a particular state, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetFirstRow%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetLastRow%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetNextRow%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetPreviousRow%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取具有特定狀態的資料列的索引，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetFirstRow%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetLastRow%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetNextRow%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetPreviousRow%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows you how to retrieve the index of the first selected row, and then use it to programmatically delete the row.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何擷取索引的第一個選取的資料列，並再用它來以程式設計方式刪除資料列。

trans-unit.source: To improve performance, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> property can include shared and unshared rows.
trans-unit.target: 為了改善效能，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection>傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>屬性可包含共用和非共用的資料列。

trans-unit.source: Shared rows share memory to reduce the cost of a large record set.
trans-unit.target: 共用的資料列共用記憶體來降低成本的大型記錄集。

trans-unit.source: If your record set is very large, you should be careful to keep the rows shared as much as possible when accessing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的資料錄集非常大，您應該將共用的資料列最大的存取時小心<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create an unbound <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>; set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersVisible%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A> properties; and use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立未繫結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>; 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersVisible%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A>[屬性]，並使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to use a version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A> methods to properly size the column headers and the rows.
trans-unit.target: 它也會示範如何使用的版本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeRows%2A>方法，以適當的設定資料行標頭和資料列大小。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `dataGridView1` and a button named `Button1`, and then call the `InitializeDataGridView` method from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到表單，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`dataGridView1`和名為按鈕`Button1`，然後呼叫`InitializeDataGridView`從表單的建構函式的方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Ensure all events are connected with their event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 請確定所有事件都已都連接其事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after a new row is added to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 發生於新的資料列加入 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 之後。

trans-unit.source: Rows in the control are not automatically sorted when new rows are added.
trans-unit.target: 加入新的資料列時，不會自動排序控制項中的資料列。

trans-unit.source: To sort new rows into their correct position, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A> method in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要排序新的資料列到正確的位置，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A>方法中的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: When the user adds a new row using the row for new records, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowsAddedEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> value in the handler for this event is equal to the index of the new location of the row for new records, which is one greater than the row just added.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者將使用新的記錄，資料列的新資料列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowsAddedEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>值的處理常式中這個事件是等於新的記錄的資料列的新位置的索引是其中一種大於剛才加入的資料列。

trans-unit.source: When you add rows programmatically, however, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowsAddedEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> value is the index of the first row added.
trans-unit.target: 當您將加入資料列以程式設計的方式，不過，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowsAddedEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>值是加入第一個資料列的索引。

trans-unit.source: In virtual mode, this event occurs before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event and can be used to create new records in your data store that you can then populate in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 在虛擬模式中，會發生此事件之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>事件可用來建立新記錄中，您可以在中填入資料存放區和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example handles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded> event to increment the number of rows in a virtual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded>事件，以遞增的虛擬機器中的資料列數目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows is used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded> handler so it knows when to show a blank cell versus an initialized cell for a new row.
trans-unit.target: 用於資料列數目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded>處理常式，讓它知道時顯示空白資料格與初始化的新資料列儲存格。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> reference topic.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>參考主題。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default style applied to the row cells of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 的資料列儲存格所套用的預設樣式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> to apply to the row cells of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 的資料列儲存格所要套用的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control displays its cells using the styles indicated by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property, which inherits styles from other properties of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項會顯示其使用由儲存格樣式的儲存格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>屬性，其他屬性的型別繼承樣式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>。
