trans-unit.source: For cells in all rows, excluding header cells, the styles specified through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> property override the styles specified through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties, and are overridden by the styles specified through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties.
trans-unit.target: 中的所有資料列的資料格，但不包括標頭資料格，透過指定的樣式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>屬性覆寫透過指定的樣式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，並透過所指定的樣式會覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格樣式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: When getting this property, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with default values will be created if the property has not already been accessed.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個屬性，當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>預設值將會建立值如果屬性已不被存取。

trans-unit.source: This can cause a performance impact when getting this property for many rows.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個屬性的多個資料列時，這可能會造成效能影響。

trans-unit.source: Whenever possible, use a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> to set this property for multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: 您應該盡可能使用單一<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>設定此屬性的多個資料列。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to use this property to create a ledger effect in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個屬性來建立在分類帳效果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when a property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> property is set to a new value or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> property is set to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object.
trans-unit.target: 屬性時，就會發生此事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>屬性設定為新值或當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>屬性設定為新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>包含至少一個屬性值不同於上一個儲存格樣式物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyleChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyleChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyleChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyleChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row or rows are deleted from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 發生於從 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 中刪除資料列時。

trans-unit.source: When rows are deleted from a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, the index numbers of subsequent rows are lowered to compensate.
trans-unit.target: 當從刪除資料列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項，後續的資料列的索引編號會降低補償。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use this event to update the values in a balance column of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用此事件可更新的平衡資料行中的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row changes state, such as losing or gaining input focus.
trans-unit.target: 資料列變更狀態 (例如失去或獲得輸入焦點) 時發生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowStateChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowStateChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowStateChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowStateChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the row that represents the template for all the rows in the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定表示控制項中所有資料列之樣板的資料列。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> representing the row template.
trans-unit.target: 表示資料列範本的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes you want greater control over the appearance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> rows than what is provided by the various <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> cell style properties.
trans-unit.target: 有時候您想進一步控制的外觀<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>資料列所提供的各種<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>儲存格樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A> property lets you create and initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> for use as a template by all rows, including the row for new records if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A>屬性可讓您建立和初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>用做的所有資料列範本，包括新的記錄的資料列如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>是`true`。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you are setting default values for properties such as row height.
trans-unit.target: 當您要設定屬性，例如資料列高度的預設值，這非常有用。

trans-unit.source: For example, you may want to increase the default row height in order to provide extra room beneath ordinary cell content for displaying content that spans multiple columns.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以增加預設資料列高度，以便可以提供額外的空間，一般儲存格內容下方顯示跨越多個資料行的內容。

trans-unit.source: Setting the row template is necessary when external data is displayed using custom types derived from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> class.
trans-unit.target: 設定資料列範本時，需要外部資料，都會使用自訂類型衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>類別。

trans-unit.source: With unbound <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controls, you can programmatically populate the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> collection with instances of your custom row type.
trans-unit.target: 使用未繫結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項，您可以透過程式設計方式填入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>與自訂資料列型別的執行個體的集合。

trans-unit.source: When displaying external data, however, the rows are generated automatically, but they are based on the row template, which you can set to an instance of your custom row type.
trans-unit.target: 顯示外部資料時，不過，資料列會自動產生，但它們所根據的資料列範本，您可以將自訂資料列型別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If this property has not been set the first time you retrieve its value, a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> is created and returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性尚未設定第一次擷取其值，新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>建立並傳回。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to use the row template to specify an initial row height and a minimum row height.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用資料列範本指定初始資料列高度和最小資料列高度。

trans-unit.source: The specified row when setting this property has its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView" /> property set.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時的指定資料列已經有設定其 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row's state changes from shared to unshared.
trans-unit.target: 資料列狀態從共用變成不共用時發生。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event during development and testing to help identify code that causes rows to change from a shared to an unshared state.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在開發和測試期間使用這個事件，找出造成資料列，從共用變更為非共用狀態的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when scaling the control to display large amounts of data.
trans-unit.target: 縮放控制項以顯示大量資料時，這非常有用。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowUnshared> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowUnshared>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowUnshared> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowUnshared>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after a row has finished validating.
trans-unit.target: 資料列完成驗證後發生。

trans-unit.source: This event is analogous to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件是類似於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated>事件。

trans-unit.source: Use this event to perform post-processing on a row of values.
trans-unit.target: 值的資料列上執行的後續處理工作中使用此事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample uses this event to clear up any error annotations that may have been left behind after validating the row.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會使用此事件，以清除可能留下驗證資料列之後的任何錯誤註釋。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row is validating.
trans-unit.target: 正在驗證資料列時發生。

trans-unit.source: This event is analogous to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件是類似於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: Use this event to perform validation on all the values of a row.
trans-unit.target: 使用此事件在資料列的所有值上執行驗證。

trans-unit.source: If the row does not pass validation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料列未通過驗證時，設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: Canceling this event prevents the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowValidated>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated?displayProperty=nameWithType> events from occurring, and also prevents the user from leaving the invalid row and prevents the row from being saved to an external data source in data bound mode.
trans-unit.target: 取消這個事件會防止<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowValidated>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件發生時，也會防止使用者離開無效的資料列，並防止資料列儲存至外部資料來源中資料繫結模式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowValidating> to check if valid track and release dates are entered.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowValidating>檢查如果輸入有效的追蹤與發行日期。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user scrolls through the control contents.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者在控制項內容中捲動時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Scroll> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Scroll>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Scroll> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Scroll>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of scroll bars to display for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項中要顯示的捲軸類型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars.Both" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars.Both" />。

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the value of this property, scroll bars are shown only when they are needed.
trans-unit.target: 不論這個屬性的值，只在需要時才會顯示捲軸。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to prevent scroll bars from appearing.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止出現捲軸使用這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: This is useful, for example, when you want to provide an alternative user interface (UI) for scrolling.
trans-unit.target: 例如，當您想要捲動提供替代的使用者介面 (UI)，這十分有用。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時所指定的值不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property cannot be set because the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> is unable to scroll due to a cell change that cannot be committed or canceled.
trans-unit.target: 因為無法認可或取消的儲存格變更造成 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 無法捲動，所以無法設定這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Selects all the cells in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 選取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 中的所有儲存格。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is in column-selection mode and this method is called, each column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> property is set to `true`, and each row's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>是在資料行選取模式，而且這個方法呼叫時，每個資料行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>屬性設定為`true`，和每個資料列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>屬性設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: Conversely, when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is in row-selection mode and this method is called, each row's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> property is set to `true`, and each column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>是在資料列選取模式，而且這個方法呼叫時，每個資料列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>屬性設定為`true`，和每個資料行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>屬性設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectAll%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectAll%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `dataGridView1` and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> named `selectAllButton`, and ensure all events are associated with their event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`dataGridView1`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>名為`selectAllButton`，並確定其事件處理常式相關聯的所有事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of cells selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: 取得使用者所選的儲存格集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection" /> that represents the cells selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection" />，表示使用者選取的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A> property is always populated regardless of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A>屬性永遠會填入不論<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>屬性值。

trans-unit.source: This property contains a read-only snapshot of the selection at the time it is referenced.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性包含在其被參考的時間選取範圍的唯讀快照集。

trans-unit.source: If you hold onto a copy of this collection, it may differ from the actual, subsequent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> state in which the user may have changed the selection.
trans-unit.target: 如果您保留此集合的複本，它可能與不同的實際後續<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>狀態中的使用者可能已變更選取項目。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you should not operate on a copy of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您不應該作業集合的複本上。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A> collection to find the sum of the values in the selection.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedCells%2A>集合選取範圍中尋找值的總和。

trans-unit.source: In the example, this collection is iterated through and the valid values are added to the sum, which is displayed in a label.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，這個集合會逐一查看和有效的值加入至顯示在標籤中的總和。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of columns selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: 取得使用者所選的資料行集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection" /> that represents the columns selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection" />，表示使用者選取的資料行。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.FullColumnSelect?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.ColumnHeaderSelect?displayProperty=nameWithType> for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedColumns%2A> property to be populated with selected columns.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>屬性必須設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.FullColumnSelect?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.ColumnHeaderSelect?displayProperty=nameWithType>如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedColumns%2A>要填入的屬性選取的資料行。

trans-unit.source: This property contains a read-only snapshot of the selection at the time it is referenced.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性包含在其被參考的時間選取範圍的唯讀快照集。

trans-unit.source: If you hold onto a copy of this collection, it may differ from the actual, subsequent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> state in which the user may have changed the selection.
trans-unit.target: 如果您保留此集合的複本，它可能與不同的實際後續<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>狀態中的使用者可能已變更選取項目。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you should not operate on a copy of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您不應該作業集合的複本上。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedColumns%2A> property to get the selected column in a programmatic sort.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedColumns%2A>屬性來取得所選資料行中的程式設計排序。

trans-unit.source: In this example, this property is used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A> method to determine the direction of the sort.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，這個屬性用於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A>方法，以判斷排序的方向。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of rows selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: 取得使用者所選的資料列集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection" /> that contains the rows selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection" />，包含使用者選取的資料列。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.FullRowSelect> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.RowHeaderSelect> for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedRows%2A> property to be populated with selected rows.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>屬性必須設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.FullRowSelect>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.RowHeaderSelect>如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedRows%2A>要填入的屬性選取的資料列。

trans-unit.source: This property contains a read-only snapshot of the selection at the time it is referenced.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性包含在其被參考的時間選取範圍的唯讀快照集。

trans-unit.source: If you hold onto a copy of this collection, it may differ from the actual, subsequent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> state in which the user may have changed the selection.
trans-unit.target: 如果您保留此集合的複本，它可能與不同的實際後續<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>狀態中的使用者可能已變更選取項目。

trans-unit.source: You should therefore not operate on a copy of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 您因此不應該作業集合的複本上。

trans-unit.source: To programmatically select a row, set its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Selected%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要以程式設計方式選取的資料列，將其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Selected%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedRows%2A> property in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserDeletingRow> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedRows%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserDeletingRow>事件。

trans-unit.source: In this example, if the first row is contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedRows%2A> collection, then the deletion is canceled.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，如果第一個資料列包含在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectedRows%2A>集合，則刪除已取消。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the current selection changes.
trans-unit.target: 目前選取範圍變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs whenever cells are selected or the selection is canceled, whether programmatically or by user action.
trans-unit.target: 選取儲存格，或取消選取項目，以程式設計方式或藉由使用者動作時，就會發生此事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, this event is useful when you want display the sum of the currently selected cells.
trans-unit.target: 例如，此事件時，您想要顯示目前選取的資料格的總和。

trans-unit.source: When you change the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged> event occurs before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 當您變更的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged>事件發生之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Any <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged> event handler accessing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> property at this time will get its previous value.
trans-unit.target: 任何<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged>事件處理常式存取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>屬性此時會取得先前的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用此事件。

trans-unit.source: In the example, the form displays the sum of values in the selected cells, and updates the sum when the selection changes.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，此表單會顯示所選的資料格的值的總和，並選取項目變更時，更新總和。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating how the cells of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> can be selected.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出要如何選取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.RowHeaderSelect" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.RowHeaderSelect" />。

trans-unit.source: Changing the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property clears the current selection.
trans-unit.target: 值變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>屬性清除目前的選取範圍。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.BackgroundColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnCount%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties.
trans-unit.target: 此外，程式碼範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `dataGridView1`, and then call the `SetUpDataGridView` method from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`dataGridView1`，然後呼叫`SetUpDataGridView`從表單的建構函式的方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Ensure all events are associated with their event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 請確定所有事件都都具有其事件處理常式相關聯。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時所指定的值不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.FullColumnSelect" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.ColumnHeaderSelect" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode" /> property of one or more columns is set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Automatic" />.
trans-unit.target: 當設定這個屬性時的指定值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.FullColumnSelect" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode.ColumnHeaderSelect" />，而且有一個或多個資料行的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode" /> 屬性設定為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Automatic" />。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left" /> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的新 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left" /> 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top" /> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的新 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top" /> 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width" /> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的新 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width" /> 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height" /> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的新 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height" /> 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" /> 值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: This member overrides <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified)" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員會覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified)" />。

trans-unit.source: One or both of the width or height values exceeds the maximum value of 8,388,607.
trans-unit.target: 寬度及 (或) 高度值超過最大值 8,388,607。

trans-unit.source: The index of the column containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: 包含儲存格的資料行之索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: 包含儲存格的資料列之索引。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to make the new current cell the anchor cell for a subsequent multicell selection using the SHIFT key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示讓新的目前儲存格變成後續使用 SHIFT 鍵之多儲存格選取範圍的錨定 (Anchor) 儲存格；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to validate the value in the old current cell and cancel the change if validation fails; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示驗證目前的舊儲存格中的值，並在驗證失敗時取消變更；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current cell is being set as a result of a mouse click; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的儲存格是設為按一下滑鼠的結果，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the currently active cell.
trans-unit.target: 設定目前的現用儲存格。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current cell was successfully set; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的儲存格已設定成功，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control uses this method whenever it changes the current cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制會變更目前的儲存格時，會使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: This method changes the current cell without changing the selection and optionally without validating the previous cell or changing the selection anchor cell.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會變更目前的儲存格，而不需要變更選取範圍以及選擇性地驗證上一個儲存格，或變更選取範圍的錨定儲存格。

trans-unit.source: The anchor cell is the first cell of a block of multiple cells that the user can select by holding down the SHIFT key and clicking the last cell of the block.
trans-unit.target: 錨定儲存格是第一個資料格區塊的使用者可以選取按住 SHIFT 鍵並按一下區塊的最後一個儲存格的多個資料格。

trans-unit.source: If `rowIndex` and `columnIndex` are both -1, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`rowIndex`和`columnIndex`是這兩個-1，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>屬性會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="columnIndex" /> is less than 0 or greater than the number of columns in the control minus 1, and <paramref name="rowIndex" /> is not -1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="columnIndex" /> 小於 0 或大於控制項中的資料行數減 1，且 <paramref name="rowIndex" /> 不是 -1。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="rowIndex" /> is less than 0 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1, and <paramref name="columnIndex" /> is not -1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> 小於 0 或大於控制項中的資料列數減 1，且 <paramref name="columnIndex" /> 不是 -1。

trans-unit.source: The specified cell has a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Visible" /> property value of <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定的儲存格具有 <see langword="false" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Visible" /> 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
This method was called for a reason other than the underlying data source being reset, and another thread is currently executing this method.
trans-unit.target: 基於重設基礎資料來源以外的原因而呼叫這個方法，且另一個執行緒目前正在執行此方法。

trans-unit.source: The new current cell tried to enter edit mode, but its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType" /> property does not indicate a class that derives from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> and implements <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 新的目前儲存格嘗試進入編輯模式，但是其 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType" /> 屬性不會指出衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> 並實作 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl" /> 的類別。

trans-unit.source: The index of the column containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: 包含儲存格的資料行之索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: 包含儲存格的資料列之索引。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to select the cell; <see langword="false" /> to cancel the selection of the cell.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示選取儲存格，<see langword="false" /> 則表示取消選取儲存格。

trans-unit.source: Changes the selection state of the cell with the specified row and column indexes.
trans-unit.target: 變更具有指定資料列和資料行索引之儲存格的選取狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control uses this method whenever it changes the selection state of a cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制變更資料格的選取狀態時，請使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The selection state changes without regard to the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property value, and without changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 選取項目狀態變更，而不考慮目前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>屬性值，而且不需要變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>屬性值。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want to implement your own selection modes.
trans-unit.target: 當您想要實作您自己的選取模式，這非常有用。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="columnIndex" /> is less than 0 or greater than the number of columns in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="columnIndex" /> 小於 0，或大於控制項中的資料行數目減 1。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="rowIndex" /> is less than 0 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> 小於 0，或大於控制項中的資料列數目減 1。

trans-unit.source: The index of the column.
trans-unit.target: 資料行的索引。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to select the column; <see langword="false" /> to cancel the selection of the column.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示選取資料行，<see langword="false" /> 則表示取消選取資料行。

trans-unit.source: Changes the selection state of the column with the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 變更具有指定索引的資料行之選取狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control uses this method whenever it changes the selection state of a column.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制變更資料行的選取狀態時，請使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The selection state changes without regard to the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property value, and without changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 選取項目狀態變更，而不考慮目前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>屬性值，而且不需要變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>屬性值。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want to implement your own selection modes.
trans-unit.target: 當您想要實作您自己的選取模式，這非常有用。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="columnIndex" /> is less than 0 or greater than the number of columns in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="columnIndex" /> 小於 0，或大於控制項中的資料行數目減 1。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row.
trans-unit.target: 資料列的索引。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to select the row; <see langword="false" /> to cancel the selection of the row.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示選取資料列，<see langword="false" /> 則表示取消選取資料列。

trans-unit.source: Changes the selection state of the row with the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 變更具有指定索引的資料列之選取狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control uses this method whenever it changes the selection state of a row.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制變更資料列之選取狀態時，請使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The selection state changes without regard to the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property value, and without changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 選取項目狀態變更，而不考慮目前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>屬性值，而且不需要變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>屬性值。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want to implement your own selection modes.
trans-unit.target: 當您想要實作您自己的選取模式，這非常有用。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> is less than 0 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> 小於 0，或大於控制項中的資料列數目減 1。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to show cell errors.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否要顯示儲存格錯誤。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a red glyph will appear in a cell that fails validation; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果驗證失敗的儲存格中將出現紅色圖像 (Glyph)，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not ToolTips will show when the mouse pointer pauses on a cell.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出當滑鼠指標在儲存格上暫停時，是否會顯示工具提示。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if cell ToolTips are enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟用儲存格的工具提示，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When the value of this property is `true` and the mouse pointer is over a cell, the cell displays a ToolTip when one of the following conditions is met:
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性的值是`true`滑鼠指標位於儲存格上，當符合下列條件時，資料格會顯示工具提示：

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is not `null` or the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`, and a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to a value other than <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>屬性不是`null`或值的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>屬性是`true`，以及處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>事件設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性以外的值為<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A> property of the cell has a value other than <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>儲存格的屬性有值以外<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property has no effect when there is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event handler because getting the value of the property automatically raises the event and returns the ToolTip text specified in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 當沒有設定這個屬性有任何作用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>事件處理常式自動取得屬性的值因為引發事件並傳回工具提示文字指定在事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The cell value is truncated in the cell display.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格顯示截斷資料格的值。

trans-unit.source: When the value of the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A> property value is <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the full value of the truncated cell value is displayed in the ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 當資料格的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>屬性值是<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>，截斷的資料格的值的完整值會顯示在工具提示。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not the editing glyph is visible in the row header of the cell being edited.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出正在編輯的儲存格之資料列行首中是否可以看到編輯圖像 (Glyph)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the editing glyph is visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以看到編輯圖像，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The row header will display an editing glyph that looks like a pencil when the current cell is in edit mode and the user has made changes to the cell.
trans-unit.target: 資料列標頭會顯示目前儲存格處於編輯模式和使用者已變更之資料格時看起來像鉛筆編輯圖像。

trans-unit.source: The editing glyph is colored by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.ForeColor%2A> property of the row header cell.
trans-unit.target: 編輯的圖像著色使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.ForeColor%2A>資料列的標頭資料格的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The glyph is not rendered if there is not enough space to display it completely.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有可用的空間不足，無法完整顯示，則不會呈現圖像。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the row header cell has its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> property set, the glyph is removed if there is not enough room for both the text and glyph.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果資料列的標頭資料格都具有其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>屬性集，圖像會移除，如果沒有足夠的空間，文字及圖像 （glyph）。

trans-unit.source: The display of the editing glyph is controlled by the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentRowDirty%2A> property in virtual mode.
trans-unit.target: 編輯圖像 （glyph） 的顯示由值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentRowDirty%2A>虛擬模式中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is controlled by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellDirty%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellDirty%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The standard glyph is not publicly exposed.
trans-unit.target: 標準圖像 （glyph） 的格式不公開。

trans-unit.source: To customize the glyph, you can create a custom <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要自訂圖像，您可以建立自訂<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether row headers will display error glyphs for each row that contains a data entry error.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出針對包含資料項目錯誤的每一個資料列，是否會在資料列標頭顯示錯誤圖像。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> indicates there is an error; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> 指出有錯誤發生，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> property indicates if there is an error in one of the cells in a row.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>屬性會指出是否在其中一個資料列中儲存格錯誤。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> is set to a value other than <xref:System.String.Empty>, then an error glyph (![ErrorProvider icon](~/add/media/vberrorprovidericon.gif "ErrorProvider icon")) is shown in the row header.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>以外設定為值<xref:System.String.Empty>，然後錯誤圖像 (![ErrorProvider 圖示](~/add/media/vberrorprovidericon.gif "ErrorProvider 圖示")) 顯示資料列標頭。

trans-unit.source: The default width of the row header includes enough room to display the error glyph, whether or not the glyph is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 資料列標頭的預設寬度包含足夠空間可顯示錯誤圖像，會顯示圖像。

trans-unit.source: If the row header size is adjusted so that there is not enough space to display the glyph completely, the glyph is not rendered.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料列的標頭大小會調整，使其不沒有足夠的空間可顯示完整的圖像，就不會轉譯圖像。

trans-unit.source: Because row headers can display both text and glyphs, header content is displayed by priority, as follows:
trans-unit.target: 文字和圖像 （glyph），可顯示資料列標頭，因為標頭內容會顯示依優先順序，如下：

trans-unit.source: Text displayed in the row header cell.
trans-unit.target: 資料列的標頭資料格中所顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The editing glyph.
trans-unit.target: 編輯的圖像。

trans-unit.source: The error glyph.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤圖像。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the row width is decreased, the error glyph disappears first, then the standard glyph, then text.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果資料列寬度就會減少，錯誤圖像會消失第一次，然後是標準的圖像，則文字。

trans-unit.source: Advanced users can customize the error glyph by developing a custom <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> class.
trans-unit.target: 進階的使用者可以透過開發自訂的自訂錯誤圖像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>類別。

trans-unit.source: Sorts the contents of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項的內容排序。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" /> that performs the custom sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: 執行自訂排序作業的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" /> 實作。

trans-unit.source: Sorts the contents of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control using an implementation of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" /> 介面的實作，將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項的內容排序。

trans-unit.source: This method allows advanced customization of the sorting feature of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可讓的排序功能的進階的自訂<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>類別。

trans-unit.source: In order to implement a highly customized sorting operation, you can write an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeaderMouseClick> event and call this method with an instance of a class that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要實作高度自訂的排序作業，您可以撰寫事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeaderMouseClick>事件和呼叫這個方法會實作類別的執行個體時<xref:System.Collections.IComparer?displayProperty=nameWithType>做為參數的介面。

trans-unit.source: In this case, you will typically set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Programmatic?displayProperty=nameWithType> to disable automatic sorting and to leave room for a sorting glyph.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，您通常會設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Programmatic?displayProperty=nameWithType>停用自動排序，並保留空間排序圖像。

trans-unit.source: When sorting by columns set to programmatic sort mode, you must display the sorting glyph yourself by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 當設定為以程式設計方式排序模式資料行來排序，您必須顯示排序圖像自行設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This method works only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法適用於只有當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: When you bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control to an external data source, you must use the sorting operations provided by that data source.
trans-unit.target: 當您繫結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項至外部資料來源，您必須使用該資料來源所提供的排序作業。

trans-unit.source: When you provide your own data source by implementing virtual mode, you must also handle the sorting operations yourself.
trans-unit.target: 當您藉由實作虛擬模式提供您自己的資料來源時，您必須也排序作業自行處理。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method automatically sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> property to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法會自動設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>屬性`null`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A> method overload in a multiple column sort scenario.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A>在多個資料行排序案例中的方法多載。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> interface is implemented in the `RowComparer` class.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，<xref:System.Collections.IComparer>中實作介面`RowComparer`類別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="comparer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="comparer" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode" /> is set to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode" /> 設定為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource" /> is not <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The column by which to sort the contents of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 內容排序時，所依據的資料行。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Sorts the contents of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control in ascending or descending order based on the contents of the specified column.
trans-unit.target: 根據指定資料行的內容，以遞增或遞減順序將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項的內容排序。

trans-unit.source: This method sorts the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> by comparing values in the specified column.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的內容排序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>藉由比較指定的資料行中的值。

trans-unit.source: By default, the sort operation will use the <xref:System.Collections.Comparer.Compare%2A> method to compare pairs of cells in the column using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，排序作業會使用<xref:System.Collections.Comparer.Compare%2A>方法來比較的資料行的使用中的儲存格組<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For columns with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Automatic?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortedColumn%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortOrder%2A> properties are set automatically and the appropriate sorting glyph is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 使用的資料行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Automatic?displayProperty=nameWithType>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortedColumn%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortOrder%2A>屬性會自動設定並顯示適當的排序圖像。

trans-unit.source: For columns with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Programmatic?displayProperty=nameWithType>, you must display the sorting glyph yourself through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用的資料行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Programmatic?displayProperty=nameWithType>，您必須顯示排序圖像自行透過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can customize the sorting operation used by this method by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare> event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以自訂處理這個方法所使用的排序作業<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare>事件。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property has not been set.
trans-unit.target: 只會發生此事件時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>屬性尚未設定。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property has been set, this method works for data-bound columns only.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>已設定屬性，這個方法適用於資料繫結資料行。

trans-unit.source: Data-bound columns have had their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property set.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結資料行有其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性集。

trans-unit.source: This causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.IsDataBound%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to return `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這會導致<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.IsDataBound%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: If your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control contains both bound and unbound columns, you must implement virtual mode to maintain the values of the unbound columns when the control is sorted by a bound column.
trans-unit.target: 如果您<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項包含繫結和繫結資料行，您必須實作虛擬模式時排序控制項所繫結的資料行維持未繫結的資料行的值。

trans-unit.source: You can do this by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property to `true` and handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded> event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>屬性`true`和處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded>事件。

trans-unit.source: If the column is editable, you should also handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料行是可編輯的您也應該處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about virtual mode, see [How to: Implement Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需虛擬模式的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 在 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中實作虛擬模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Sorting by unbound columns when the control is data-bound is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援資料繫結控制項時，依未繫結的資料行排序。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A> in a programmatic sort.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A>中以程式設計方式排序。

trans-unit.source: The specified column is not part of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定的資料行並不是這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 的一部分。

trans-unit.source: -or-

The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource" /> property has been set and the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.IsDataBound" /> property of the specified column returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource" /> 屬性已經設定，而且指定資料行的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.IsDataBound" /> 屬性傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dataGridViewColumn" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dataGridViewColumn" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode" /> property is set to <see langword="true" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.IsDataBound" /> property of the specified column returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode" /> 屬性設定為 <see langword="true" />，而且指定資料行的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.IsDataBound" /> 屬性傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The object specified by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource" /> property does not implement the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource" /> 屬性所指定的物件不會實作 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList" /> 介面。

trans-unit.source: -or-

The object specified by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource" /> property has a <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting" /> property value of <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource" /> 屬性所指定的物件具有 <see langword="false" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting" /> 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> compares two cell values to perform a sort operation.
trans-unit.target: 發生在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 比較兩個儲存格值來執行排序作業時。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is not set and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 只會發生此事件時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>屬性未設定而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>屬性值是`false`。

trans-unit.source: This event compares pairs of cells in the column being sorted.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件會比較組排序的資料行中的資料格。

trans-unit.source: It occurs only when the user clicks the header of a column with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Automatic>, or when you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%28System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn%2CSystem.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection%29> overload.
trans-unit.target: 只有當使用者按一下資料行的標頭時，才發生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>屬性值為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Automatic>，或當您呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%28System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn%2CSystem.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection%29>多載。

trans-unit.source: When this event occurs for a column with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Programmatic>, you must display the sorting glyph yourself through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 當發生此事件的資料行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>屬性值為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Programmatic>，您必須顯示排序圖像自行透過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to sort rows using the cell values in one column or in multiple columns.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個事件來排序資料列或多個資料行中有一個資料行使用資料格的值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue1%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue2%2A> properties to compare cell values in the column specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.Column%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue1%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue2%2A>來比較資料格的值中指定的資料行中的屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.Column%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex1%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex2%2A> properties to access values in other columns through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex1%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex2%2A>屬性來存取透過其他資料行中的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare> in a multiple column sort.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare>在多個資料行排序。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize Sorting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-sorting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中排序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-sorting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control completes a sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: 發生在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項完成排序作業時。

trans-unit.source: This event does not occur when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is set to `true` and the control is sorted by an unbound column.
trans-unit.target: 不會發生此事件時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>屬性設定為`true`和控制項所繫結的資料行排序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to ensure that the current cell is visible after sorting.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何確保目前儲存格顯示完成排序之後。

trans-unit.source: This code works only with an unbound <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼僅適用於未繫結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: With a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control bound to an external data source, the current cell is not automatically persisted when sorting.
trans-unit.target: 與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項繫結至外部資料來源，目前儲存格不會自動保存排序時。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `dataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到表單，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`dataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: In C#, you must also connect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sorted> event to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 在 C# 中，您也必須連接<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sorted>事件，事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the column by which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> contents are currently sorted.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 內容目前排序所依據的資料行。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn" /> by which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> contents are currently sorted.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 內容目前排序所依據的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is not sorted, this property will return `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>未排序，此屬性會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: When the column indicated by this property has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Automatic?displayProperty=nameWithType>, it will display a sorting glyph based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortOrder%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性所表示的資料行具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>屬性值為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Automatic?displayProperty=nameWithType>，它會顯示的值為基礎的排序圖像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortOrder%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When the column has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Programmatic?displayProperty=nameWithType>, you must display the sorting glyph yourself through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 當資料行具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>屬性值為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Programmatic?displayProperty=nameWithType>，您必須顯示排序圖像自行透過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is not meaningful when you sort the control using custom sorting.
trans-unit.target: 當您排序控制項使用的自訂排序時，這個屬性的值沒有意義。

trans-unit.source: For more information about custom sorting, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%28System.Collections.IComparer%29> method and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare> event.
trans-unit.target: 如需自訂排序的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%28System.Collections.IComparer%29>方法和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare>事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortedColumn%2A> property in a programmatic sort.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortedColumn%2A>中的程式設計排序屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the items in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control are sorted in ascending or descending order, or are not sorted.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項中的項目是以遞增或遞減順序排序，或者根本不排序。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: This property is used to determine which sorting glyph appears when the column specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortedColumn%2A> property has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Automatic>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性用來判斷所指定資料行時，會出現的排序圖像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortedColumn%2A>屬性具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>屬性值為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Automatic>。

trans-unit.source: When the column has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Programmatic>, you must display and hide the sorting glyph yourself through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當資料行具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>屬性值為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.Programmatic>，您必須顯示並自行隱藏排序圖像，透過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When the column has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.NotSortable>, you can display the sorting glyph, but space is not reserved for it if the column is automatically resized.
trans-unit.target: 當資料行具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>屬性值為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.NotSortable>，您可以顯示排序圖像，但如果資料行自動調整大小，它不保留空間。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is not meaningful when you sort the control using custom sorting.
trans-unit.target: 當您排序控制項使用的自訂排序時，這個屬性的值沒有意義。

trans-unit.source: For more information about custom sorting, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A> method and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare> event.
trans-unit.target: 如需自訂排序的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A>方法和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare>事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortOrder%2A> property in a programmatic sort.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortOrder%2A>中的程式設計排序屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the TAB key moves the focus to the next control in the tab order rather than moving focus to the next cell in the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出 TAB 鍵是否會將焦點移到定位順序中的下一個控制項，而不是將焦點移到控制項中的下一個儲存格。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the TAB key moves the focus to the next control in the tab order; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 TAB 鍵會將焦點移到定位順序中的下一個控制項，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `false` allows the TAB key to move the focus through the grid of cells.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性設定為`false`允許 TAB 鍵將焦點移到透過儲存格的格線。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes how the cell focus changes when the given TAB key combinations are pressed.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述如何儲存格焦點變更時按下指定的索引標籤組合。

trans-unit.source: Key combination
trans-unit.target: 按鍵組合

trans-unit.source: Result
trans-unit.target: 結果
